You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates
the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds
of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes.  It is very quiet here.

easternExit.description: All you can see are books.

northernExit.description: All you can see are books.

southernExit.description: All you can see are books.

title: In The Library

westernExit.description: All you can see are books.

description:
You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates
the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds
of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes.  It is very quiet here.

easternExit.description: All you can see are books.

title: In The Library

westernExit.description: You see a small gap between some shelves.

description:
You are in the great library of magic.  The shelves seem uncomfortably
close here, you can barely maneuver between them.  The musty smell is still
strong, and the elusive books still hover just out of reach.
A faint flicker of light can barely be made out to the north.
title: Between The Shelves

description:
You are in a small room completely devoid of furnishings.  The only thing
here is an enormous tome, lying face open on the floor.  The great book looks
both heavy and ancient.  Its jewel encrusted bindings are well worn as the
bark of a tree.  Spidery writings seem to crawls across the pages, totally
incomprehensible to your mortal eye.  Something seems to be wedged between
the pages.
title: The Reading Room

description:
You are in a long corridor leading north and south.  Obsidian walls
engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you.  Magical
energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues
long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.
title: A Corridor

description:
You are at the end of a long corridor.  The obsidian walls come to an
abrupt halt at the edge of a golden archway here.  The hum of power is so
strong it nearly numbs your body.
The archway lies before you, glowing and pulsing with energy.
title: The End Of The Corridor

description:
You feel a slight tingle as you pass through the archway, as if the living
magical energies here had infused your body, found it wanting and left.  The
intense glow from the arch above you is almost blinding.  Through the light
you can barely make out a stairway leading up.
title: The Arched Entrance

description:
You are on a small landing in the middle of a long stairway leading up.
Your senses seem dulled here, no sound or smell can be detected at all, and
the only thing you can see in any direction is endless stairway.
title: The Landing

description:
You are at an intersection of several hallways.  You feel as if strange
mystical forces are pushing and pulling at each other from all around you.
The sensation of being trapped, in the middle is almost tangible in the air
here.
A grey tiled hallway leads south, black tiled east, white tiled west,
and a multi-coloured hallway swirling with patterns that remain just barely
unrecognizable is to the north.
title: An Intersection

description:
You are in a grey tiled hallway leading north and south.  Dim balls
of energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the
way.  A feeling of peace and balance comes over you.
title: A Grey Tiled Hallway

description:
You are in a grey tiled hallway leading north and south.  Dim balls
of energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the
way.  A feeling of peace and balance comes over you.
Large, grey metal double doors can be seen to the south.
title: A Grey Tiled Hallway

description:
You are in the antechamber of the Master Magician of the Grey Light.
A feeling of strong magic floats in the air about you, almost as if you
could taste the power held within these walls.
Once your eyes adjust to the semi-light, you can make out a larger
room to the south.
title: The Antechamber

description:
A feeling of tranquility comes over you as you enter the main chamber
of Neutrality.  Some artifacts are hung on the walls here, or set on stands.
The room in general looks both comfortable and official.  Probably where the
Master of Neutrality holds audience.
title: The Main Chamber

description:
You are in a large study.  Shelves filled with many books or arcane
knowledge are on every wall.  A large oaken desk is in the center, with
many parchments and scrolls on it.  The most notable thing in the room is
a small set of scales, which floats about eye level.  In perfect balance,
the scales are no doubt a sign of the Master's neutrality.
title: The Study

description:
You are in a small closet.  It is filled with many cloaks, and some
other apparel.
title: A Closet

description:
You are in the bedroom of the Master Magician of Neutrality.
Curtained windows can be seen on the south wall.  A large
comfortable looking bed takes up most of the room.
title: A Bedroom

description:
You are in a long dark hallway leading east and west.  Not much can
be seen in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread
the further you go.
title: A Dark Hallway

description:
You are in a long dark hallway leading east and west.  Not much can
be seen in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread
the further you go.
title: A Dark Hallway

description:
You are at the end of a long dark hallway.  The darkness here is almost
tangible in its thickness.  A deep sense of fear and loathing comes over
you.
A pair of obsidian doors can be seen to the east.
title: The End Of The Hallway

description:
You are in a vast chamber.  The walls fade into darkness, leaving you
with a very vague idea of the actual size of the room.  Swirling here and
there in the dark, are patches of pure black which seem to suck in your
light and leave it that much darker here.
title: The Chamber Of Darkness

description: It is very dark here...
title: It Is Very Dark Here...

description:
You are in an ill lit chamber.  Instruments of torture hang from a rack
on the wall, they seem to quiver with anticipation of a victim as if they
had a mind of their own.  An operating table is here, though it is bare.
An extreme feeling of evil permeates the entire area.
title: A Torture Chamber

description:
You are in a small dark chamber.  Upon the walls are glowing sigils of
dark power, scrawled and traced in an evil language no longer known to most
of this plane of existence.  There is an obsidian altar here which seems to
glow, but does not shed any light, in fact it seems to be taking light in.
title: The Inner Chamber

description:
You are in a long well lit hallway leading east and west.  The walls
here are a milky white colour, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does
the floor.  A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy
to tread upon these sacred floors.
title: A Bright Hallway

description:
You are in a long well lit hallway leading east and west.  The walls
here are a milky white colour, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does
the floor.  A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy
to tread upon these sacred floors.
A huge set of double doors in finely worked ivory can be seen to the
west.
title: A Bright Hallway

description:
You are in a small antechamber.  It is well lit here, though the source
of light cannot be seen.  It is almost as if the room itself exudes a warm
glow of goodness.  A larger chamber can be seen to the west, but you do not
feel worthy to pass into it.
title: An Antechamber

description:
You are in a vast chamber, its walls floor and ceiling are of an
unknown metallic material, the brightest white, almost blindingly stark.
A flickering flame is in the center of the room, seeming to feed off of
darkness and cleansing the room of any evil.  You feel a slight tug at
your being as the flame flickers towards you.
title: The Chamber Of The White Light

description:
You are in a small meditation chamber.  White silk cushions are
everywhere, looking very comfortable.  You get an easy peaceful
feeling of relaxation here, almost making you want to lie down and
fall asleep.
title: The Meditation Chamber

description:
You are in a spacious study.  It is extremely tidy here, to an almost
antiseptic nature.  One would wonder how anyone could study without a
mess all around them, the master of this chamber obviously can.
title: A Study

description:
You are in a small closet.  Cloaks and vests hang from hooks in
the wall, and a few old boots are all that can be seen here.  Rather
featureless all in all.
title: A Closet

description:
You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people
standing abreast.  The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns, in
constant motion.
A huge, grey metal door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.
title: A Wide Hallway

description:
You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people
standing abreast.  The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns, in
constant motion.
A huge, black obsidian door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.
title: A Wide Hallway

description:
You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people
standing abreast.  The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns, in
constant motion.
A huge, white ivory door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.
title: A Wide Hallway

description:
You are at the entrance to the audience chamber of the Grand Master of
Magic.  Beautiful tapestries displaying the ancient masters of lore are on
the walls, and the floor is covered with a plush multicoloured carpet, which
seems to rustle and move at the touch of your boots.
title: The Entranceway

extras.description: The giant emerald is flawless, and must be incredibly valuable.

description:
You are in a large chamber.  Small bolts of energy leap from wall to
wall, crackling with power.  The floor is a swirl of indeterminable colours
and patterns ever changing.  Bright bursts of colour seem to explode into
the air and fade again at random times.  All this splendor plays about and
draws attention to a large throne in the center of the room, it seems to be
cut from a single enormous emerald.
title: The Audience Chamber

description:
You are in a plush dressing room.  Fine garments of many styles and some
outlandish colours hang from a rack suspended in mid air at eye level.  The
only other interesting feature in the room is a large silver mirror on a
finely crafted gold stand.
title: A Dressing Room

description:
You are in a small cosy looking library.  A few well made books sit atop
shelves which span every wall.  A large oaken writing table is in the center
of the room with odd papers and parchments on it.  The illumination here,
to your surprise is a quite un-magical oil lamp.
title: The Library

description:
You are in a small chapel designed around a beautifully crafted golden
altar.  Many icons to lesser deities line the room, but it is obvious by
one glance at the symbols on the altar, that this room was designed for
the worship of Mystra, the goddess of magic.
title: The Altar

description:
You are in a small chamber, the stale air here is testament to the fact
that it has gone undisturbed for many years.
title: The Treasury

description:
You are in a small dark passage, which would be unremarkable if not for
the fact that it ends in a blinding blue light to the west.  On hooks set
into the wall here there hang several travel worthy cloaks, and a small
leather backpack.  It looks as if someone has prepared this room to be used
in the event speedy of a evacuation.
title: A Passage

description:
You seem to be floating in a magical energy field, though you cannot
see the source of the energy, you can feel its power pushing at you from
all sides, completely negating the effects of gravity.
An imperfection in the uniform blue can be seen overhead, it might be
an exit.
title: In The Light

description:
You are in a small, simple room which is mostly empty, save a few
wooden desks and benches.  To the east you hear the bustle of the Temple
of Midgaard, a sharp contrast to the relative quiet of this peaceful
room.

easternExit.description: You see the Temple of Midgaard.

title: The Reading Room

description:
You are in the southern end of the temple hall in the Temple of Midgaard.
The temple has been constructed from giant marble blocks, eternal in
appearance, and most of the walls are covered by ancient wall paintings
picturing Gods, Giants and peasants.
Large steps lead down through the grand temple gate, descending the huge
mound upon which the temple is built and ends on the temple square below.
To the west, you see the Reading Room.  The donation room is in a small
alcove to your east.

downwardExit.description: You see the temple square.

easternExit.description:
In the east, you see a small alcove with a rickety wooden sign which
reads "Midgaard Donation Room."

northernExit.description: At the northern end of the temple hall is a statue and a huge altar.

southernExit.description: You look down the huge stone steps at the temple square below.

title: The Temple Of Midgaard

westernExit.description: You see the Reading Room.

description:
This is the inner sanctum.  A picture of the mighty Thor, is hanging on
the wall, just above the altar which is set against the western wall.  A well
in the middle of the floor leads down into darkness.  Vile smells waft from
the depths.

downwardExit.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

easternExit.description: You see your favorite place, the bar of divination.

title: The Clerics' Inner Sanctum

extras.description:
The sign reads:
Free instructions provided by the waiter:

Buy  - Buy something (drinkable) from the waiter.
List - The waiter will show you all the different drinks and
specialties, and tell the price of each.

description:
The bar is one of the finest in the land, lucky it is members only.  Fine
furniture is set all around the room.  A small sign is hanging on the wall.

southernExit.description: You see the entrance.

title: The Bar Of Divination

westernExit.description: You see the inner sanctum.

description:
The entrance hall is a small modest room, reflecting the true nature of
the Clerics.  The exit leads east to the temple square.  A small entrance to
the bar is in the northern wall.

easternExit.description: You see the Temple Square.

northernExit.description: You see the bar, richly decorated with really stylish furniture.

title: The Entrance To The Clerics' Guild

description:
You are standing on the temple square.  Huge marble steps lead up to the
temple gate.  The entrance to the Clerics' Guild is to the west, and the old
Grunting Boar Inn, is to the east.  Just south of here you see the market
square, the center of Midgaard.

easternExit.description: You see the good old Grunting Boar Inn.

northernExit.description: You see the temple.

southernExit.description: You see the Market Square.

title: The Temple Square

westernExit.description: You see the entrance to the Clerics' Guild.

description:
You are standing in the entrance hall of the Grunting Boar Inn.  The hall
has been wisely decorated with simple, functional furniture.  The heavy smell
of dust and aging paper drifts in from the Post Office to the north.  A small
staircase leads up to the reception and the bar is to the east.

easternExit.description: Surprise!  You see the bar.

northernExit.description: You see the Midgaard Post Office.

title: The Entrance Hall Of The Grunting Boar Inn

upwardExit.description: You see the reception.

westernExit.description: You see the temple square.

extras.description:
The sign reads:
Free instructions provided by the Grunting Boar Inn.

Buy  - Buy something (drinkable) from the bartender.
List - The bartender will show you all the different drinks and
specialties, and tell the price of each.

Although it is very hard to understand, you think it looks a lot like beer,
poems about beer, and small beer-mugs.

description:
You are standing in the bar.  The bar is set against the northern wall, old
archaic writing, carvings and symbols cover its top.  A fireplace is built into
the western wall, and through the southeastern windows you can see the temple
square.  This place makes you feel like home.
A small sign with big letters is fastened to the bar.
title: The Grunting Boar

westernExit.description: You see the exit to the entrance hall.

extras.description:
Rooms are expensive but good!  You may:

Offer - get an offer on a room - Time is in real life days.
Rent  - Rent a room (saves your stuff, and quits the game),
minimum charge is one day.


MY WAY OR THE HIGHWAY
PAY YOUR RENT!
WE WON'T THINK TWICE BEFORE KICKING YOU OUT.

description:
You are standing in the reception.  The staircase leads down to the
entrance hall.  An exit to the north leads to the Cryogenic Center.
There is a small sign on the counter.

downwardExit.description: You see the entrance hall.

northernExit.description: You see the Cryogenic Center.

title: The Reception

extras.description:
You see that this is truly delicious pastry.  Must be made by a Dane from
Denmark (which surely is not the capital of Sweden!).  Former ruler of
Scandinavia, England, Northern Germany, Northern France, Russia, Greenland,
Iceland, Estonia etc.  etc.
The sight of those large, wholesome chokoladeboller makes your mouth water
and your soul sing.

Free instructions provided by the store:

Buy  - Will buy you some bread or pastry.
List - The baker will kindly tell you the price and sort of the bread in
his bakery.

description:
You are standing inside the small bakery.  A sweet scent of Danish and
fine bread fills the room.  The bread and Danish are arranged in fine order
on the shelves, and seem to be of the finest quality.
A small sign is on the counter.

southernExit.description: You see the main street.

title: The Bakery

extras.description:
The note reads:

List  - Show which various items are in the store.
Buy   - Buy an item.
Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
pay for your item.
Sell  - Sell an item.

description:
You are inside the general store.  All sorts of items are stacked on shelves
behind the counter, safely out of your reach.
A small note hangs on the wall.

southernExit.description: You see the main street.

title: The General Store

extras.description:
The note reads:

List  - Show which various items are in the store.
Buy   - Buy an item.
Value - The shopkeeper will (free of charge) tell how much he will
pay for your item.
Sell  - Sell an item.

description: You are inside the weapon shop.  There is a small note on the counter.

southernExit.description: You see the main street.

title: The Weapon Shop

description:
You are at the end of the main street of Midgaard.  South of here is the
entrance to the Guild of Magic Users.  The street continues east towards the
market square.  The magic shop is to the north and to the west is the city
gate.

easternExit.description: You see the main street.

northernExit.description: You see the magic shop.

southernExit.description: You see the entrance to the Guild of Magic Users.

title: Main Street

westernExit.description: You see the city gate.

description:
You are on the main street passing through the City of Midgaard.  South of
here is the entrance to the Armory, and the bakery is to the north.  East of
here is the market square.

easternExit.description: You see the market square.

northernExit.description: You see the bakery.

southernExit.description: You see the armory.

title: Main Street

westernExit.description: You see the main street.

extras.description: What you see is the Midgaard Worm, stretching around the Palace of Midgaard.

description:
You are standing on the market square, the famous Square of Midgaard.
A large, peculiar looking statue is standing in the middle of the square.
Roads lead in every direction, north to the temple square, south to the
common square, east and westbound is the main street.

easternExit.description: You see the main street.

northernExit.description: You see the temple square.

southernExit.description: You see the common square.

title: Market Square

westernExit.description: You see the main street.

description:
You are on the main street crossing through town.  To the north is the
general store, and the main street continues east.  To the west you see and
hear the market place, to the south a small door leads into the Pet Shop.

easternExit.description: You see the main street.

northernExit.description: You see the general store.

southernExit.description: You see the Pet Shop.

title: Main Street

westernExit.description: You see the market square.

description:
The main street, to the north is the weapon shop and to the south is the
Guild of Swordsmen.  To the east you leave town and to the west the street
leads to the market square.

easternExit.description: You see the city gate.

northernExit.description: You see the weapon shop.

southernExit.description: You see the swordsmen's guild.

title: Main Street

westernExit.description: You see the main street leading to the market square.

description: The entrance hall to this guild is a small, poor lighted room.

northernExit.description: You see the main street.

southernExit.description: You see your favorite place, the Mages' Bar.

title: The Entrance To The Mages' Guild

description:
The bar is one of the weirdest in the land.  Mystical images float around
the air.  Illusions of fine furniture appear all around the room.

easternExit.description: You see the laboratory.

northernExit.description: You see the lobby.

title: The Mages' Bar

description:
This is the Magical Experiments Laboratory.  Dark smoke-stained stones
arch over numerous huge oaken tables, most of these cluttered with strange-
looking pipes and flasks.  The floor is covered with half-erased pentagrams
and even weirder symbols, and a blackboard in a dark corner has only been
partially cleaned, some painful-looking letters faintly visible.  A well in
the middle of the floor leads down into darkness.  Vile smells waft from the
depths.

downwardExit.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

title: The Mages' Laboratory

westernExit.description: You see the bar.

extras.description:
You can use these commands for trading:

value <item>     To get the price of an item in your possession.
sell <item>      To sell something.
buy <item>       To buy something (provided that the shop has it in store).
list             Gives you a listing of the shop's inventory.

WE DON'T GIVE CREDIT; WE DON'T EXPECT TO RECEIVE CREDIT!
NO HAGGLING

description:
The armory with all kinds of armors on the walls and in the window.  You
see helmets, shields and chain mails.  To the north is the main street.
On the wall is a small note.

northernExit.description: You see the main street.

title: The Armory

description:
The entrance hall to the Guild of Swordsmen.  A place where one has to be
careful not to say something wrong (or right).  To the east is the bar and to
the north is the main street.

easternExit.description: You see the swordsmen's bar, many noises comes from there.

northernExit.description: You see the main street.

title: The Entrance Hall To The Guild Of Swordsmen

description:
The bar of swordsmen, once upon a time beautifully furnished.  But now the
furniture is all around you in small pieces.  To the south is the yard, and
to the west is the entrance hall.

southernExit.description: You see the practice yard.

title: The Bar Of Swordsmen

westernExit.description: You see the entrance hall to the warriors' guild.

description:
This is the practice yard of the fighters.  To the north is the bar.
A well leads down into darkness.

downwardExit.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

northernExit.description: You see the bar.

title: The Tournament And Practice Yard

description:
You are at the poor alley.  South of here is the Grubby Inn and to the
east you see common square.  The alley continues further west.

easternExit.description: You see the common square.

southernExit.description: You see the Inn.

title: The Eastern End Of Poor Alley

westernExit.description: You see the poor alley.

description:
The common square, people pass you, talking to each other.  To the west is
the poor alley and to the east is the dark alley.  To the north, this square
is connected to the market square.  From the south you notice a nasty smell.

easternExit.description: You see the dark alley.

northernExit.description: You see the market square.

southernExit.description: You see the city dump.

title: The Common Square

westernExit.description: You see Poor Alley.

extras.description: It is the thieves' guild, don't enter if you care about your health or money.

description:
The dark alley, to the west is the common square and to the south is the
Guild of Thieves.  The alley continues east.

easternExit.description: The alley continues east.

southernExit.description: You see the entrance to the thieves' guild.

title: The Dark Alley

westernExit.description: You see the common square.

description:
The entrance hall to the thieves' and assassins' guild.  A place where you
can lose both your life and your money, if you are not careful.  To the north
is the dark alley and to the east is the thieves' bar.

easternExit.description: You see the thieves bar, where everything disappears.

northernExit.description: You see the alley.

title: The Entrance Hall To The Guild Of Thieves

extras.description: As you look at the furniture, the chair you sit on disappears.

description:
The bar of the thieves.  Once upon a time this place was beautifully
furnished, but now it seems almost empty.  To the south is the yard, and to
the west is the entrance hall.
(Maybe the furniture has been stolen?!)

southernExit.description: You see the secret yard.

title: The Thieves' Bar

westernExit.description: You see the entrance hall to the thieves' guild.

description:
The secret practice yard of thieves and assassins.  To the north is the
bar.  A well leads down into darkness.

downwardExit.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

northernExit.description: You see the bar.

title: The Secret Yard

description:
The dump, where the people from the city drop their garbage.  Through the
garbage you can see a large junction of pipes, looks like the entrance to the
sewer system.  North of here you see the common square.

downwardExit.description: You see the sewers.

northernExit.description: You see the common square.

title: The Dump

extras.description:
The sign reads:

Use 'List' to see the available pets.
Use 'Buy <pet>' to buy yourself a pet.

Instructions for having pets:

You can use 'order <pet> <instructions>' to order your pets around.
If you abuse your pet, it will no longer regard you as its master.
If you have several pets you may use 'order followers <instructions>'

You can name the pet you buy with: 'buy <pet> <name>'

Regards,

The Shopkeeper

description:
The Pet Shop is a small crowded store, full of cages and animals of
various sizes.  There is a sign on the wall.

northernExit.description: You see the main street.

title: The Pet Shop

description:
This  is the small dark room in which the Pet shop keeps his pets.
It is vital that this room's virtual number is exactly one larger
than the Pet Shop number.
title: Pet Shop Store

description:
Behind the counter you see various items, neatly placed in racks,
presumably most of them are magic.

southernExit.description: You see the main street.

title: The Magic Shop

extras.description:
It is too high up to reach but it looks as if one easily could walk across it
from one tower to the other.

It is a set of very big double doors made from hard wood.  They have been
reinforced with large iron bands to make them even more sturdy.  One of the
doors is equipped with a very big lock.

Both of the towers are built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to
each other with some kind of mortar, just like the city wall.

It is built from large grey rocks that have been fastened to each other with
some kind of mortar.  It is far too high to climb.

easternExit.description: You see Main Street.

southernExit.description:

that it is called Wall Road.

You are standing on the stone bridge crosses the river.  The bridge is

description:
You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and
connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  To the east the
plains stretch out in the distance.

title: Outside The East Gate Of Midgaard

westernExit.description: You see the city gate.

extras.description:
Even though the altar is more than ten feet long it appears to be made from
a single block of white virgin marble.

The statue represents the one-eyed Odin sitting on a his throne.  He has
long, grey hair and beard and a strict look on his face.  On top of the
throne, just above his shoulders, his two ravens Hugin and Munin are sitting
and at his feet are his wolves Gere and Freke.

description:
You are by the temple altar in the northern end of the Temple of
Midgaard.  A huge altar made from white polished marble is standing
in front of you and behind it is a ten foot tall sitting statue of
Odin, the King of the Gods.
To the north, steps lead out the back of the temple towards the
countryside.

northernExit.description: You see the vast Midgaard countryside.

southernExit.description: You see the southern end of the temple.

title: By The Temple Altar

description:
This is the small dark room in which Odin keeps the player items that he
takes care of.  It is vital that this room's virtual number is exactly one
larger than the room by the temple altar.
title: Odin's Store

description:
You are standing in the center of a small wooden shop whose walls are
covered with racks upon racks of water jugs.  Several large barrels with
spigots are stacked in the corner.

northernExit.description: You see the East Gate.

title: Ye Olde Water Shoppe

description:
You are on a dirt path leading away from the Temple Altar which is south
of here.  To the north, the path continues through the lush contryside of
Midgaard towards the Dragonhelm Mountains far off to the north.

northernExit.description: You see the lush, green countryside of Midgaard.

southernExit.description: You see the Temple Altar.

title: Behind The Temple Altar

description:
You are walking on a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh
Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north, east,
and west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around you
is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun feels
wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair.  Birds
chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers
and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie down in the grass and
stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.
The path you are on continues north through the field and south back
to Midgaard.

northernExit.description: You see more of the path through the Great Field.

southernExit.description: You see the path which goes back to Midgaard.

title: The Great Field Of Midgaard

description:
You are walking on a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh
Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north, east,
and west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around you
is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun feels
wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair.  Birds
chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers
and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie down in the grass and
stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.
There is a strange structure on the eastern side of the path.  A small
dirt path splits off of the main path and leads off to the west.

easternExit.description: There is a strange structure to the east on the edge of the trail.

northernExit.description:
The path continues northwards bringing you ever closer to the Dragonhelm
Mountains.

southernExit.description: You see more of the Field.

title: The Great Field Of Midgaard

westernExit.description: There is a strange path leading towards a rusty gate to the west.

extras.description:
**********************************************************
*     							 *
*    Mail Instructions:                                  *
*							 *
*      To send a note to someone:                        *
*         MAIL <playername>				 *
*     							 *
*      To see if you have any mail:                      *
*         CHECK						 *
*							 *
*      To get the Postmaster to give you your mail:      *
*         RECEIVE					 *
*							 *
*         Stamps cost 150 coins per letter               *
*         Type 'HELP MAIL' for more info                 *
**********************************************************

Envelopes of all sizes are heaped into hugh piles around the room.  As you
look closer, you see a letter that you had posted a full week ago, laying
unnoticed and slightly rat-chewed towards the bottom of the pile.
They seem to cover everything here, even the Postmaster himself.

As you know, it is illegal to send contraband items through the Midgaard
Mail.  The customs agents use this as a great excuse to seize liquor,
rare spices, and just about anything they might find useful or profitable.

Faces of various known Killers and Thieves can barely be seen behind the
crates on the west wall.  Some of them look quite familar, sorta like that
guy who you saw in the Reception a minute ago... but then again, they are
rather hard to see past the crates.

description:
You are in the central post office for Midgaard.  Piles of assorted mail
lay untouched in the corners, collecting cobwebs.  Several large crates have
been pried open by curious customs agents, and are now stacked along the west
wall, hiding plenty of 'WANTED' posters.
There is a sign posted on the wall here.

southernExit.description: You see the entrance to the Grunting Boar Inn and Tavern.

title: The Post Office

description:
You are in a small, undecorated room just off of the main temple.  There
are a couple of small wooden benches here where people occasionally sit
while they wait for items to appear.  The temple is to the west.
title: The Midgaard Donation Room

westernExit.description: The busy temple is back west.

description:
You are standing in an impossible white sterile room with cylindrical
body-length canisters lined up against the walls.  The Reception is to the
south.

southernExit.description: The Reception is to the south.

title: The Cryogenic Center

extras.description:
What more is a plot device than something to block a certain direction
for reasons beyond your comprehension.

description:
You are walking on a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh
Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north, east,
and west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around you
is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun feels
wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair.  Birds
chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers
and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie down in the grass and
stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.
The way north appears to be blocked by a large plot device and you cannot
see any way around it.

northernExit.description:
Unfortunately the way north is blocked by a large plot device and there
does not seem to be any way around it.

southernExit.description:
The path continues through the field to the south past an odd structure
on the eastern side of the path.

title: The Great Field Of Midgaard

description:
You are walking along a narrow dirt path through the lush, green,
fresh Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north
and east; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around
you is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun
feels wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your
hair.  Birds chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint
scent of flowers and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie
down in the grass and stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty
in all directions.
There is a large rusty gate sitting in a stone archway just to the
west.

easternExit.description: The path meets up with a larger path just to the east.

title: The Dirt Path

westernExit.description: There is a large rusty gate just to the west.

description:
You are at the concourse, the city wall is just west.  A small promenade
goes east, and the bridge is just north of here.  The concourse continues
south along the city wall.

easternExit.description: You see the promenade.

northernExit.description: You see the Bridge.

southernExit.description: The promenade continues far south.

title: The Northwest End Of The Concourse

The river gently flows westwards just north of here.  The promenade

easternExit.description: The promenade continues.

southernExit.description: Park Road leads south.

westernExit.description: You see the Concourse.

southernExit.description: You see the park entrance.

westernExit.description: You see the promenade.

You are standing just inside the small park of Midgaard.  To the north is

description:

title: A Small Path In The Park

You are on a small path running through the park.  It continues west and

title: A Path In The Park

westernExit.description: You see the western park entrance.

description:
You are swimming around in the pond, feeling rather stupid.  You can get
back on the path from the eastern and western end of the pond.
title: The Pond

You are in the park.  The paths lead north and east.  Eastward is the
park entrance and to the west you see a small pond.
title: A Path In The Park

description:
You are standing at the eastern end of the park.  A small path leads west

title: The Eastern Park Entrance

description:
You are standing on the north end of Emerald Avenue.  To the north is the
promenade and to the west is the park entrance.  To the east is the not very

title: Emerald Avenue

description: You are on Park Road which leads north and south.
title: Park Road

description:
You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  The road leads north and
west.
title: Emerald Avenue

extras.description:
The sign points in all directions:

North - Emerald Avenue.
East  - Park Road.
South - Emerald Avenue.
West  - Park Road.

Someone has added the following with red paint:

Up    - Redferne's Flying Citadel.

The chain reaches the clouds high above you.  It must take some really
powerful magic to hold such a chain in place.

description:
You are in the middle of the road cross.  Roads lead in all directions.
A huge black iron chain as thick as a tree trunk is fastened into the ground
at the center of the road cross.  Its other end leads directly upwards towards
the sky.
A road sign is here.
title: The Road Crossing

upwardExit.description: The chain disappears in the clouds.

description:
You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  The road leads south and
east.
title: Emerald Avenue

description:
You are on Park Road which leads south and north.  Elm Street is east of
here.
title: Park Road

You are on Elm street.  Park Road is to the west and Elm Street continues
in eastward direction.
title: Elm Street

title: The End Of Elm Street

description:
You are on Emerald Avenue which continues north.  The Concourse is south

title: Emerald Avenue

description:
You are on Park Road which continues north.  The Concourse is south of

title: Park Road

title: On The Concourse

description:
The Concourse continues both east and west.  Emerald Avenue is north of
here.
title: On The Concourse

The Concourse continues both east and west.  Park Road is north of here

title: On The Concourse

title: Park Road

You are at Emerald Avenue which continues north and south.  Penny Lane leads

title: Emerald Avenue

You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  To the east the road goes on
and to the south is the Road Crossing.
title: Emerald Avenue

description:
You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  To the west the road goes on
and to the north is the Road Crossing.
title: Emerald Avenue

description:
You are at a bend on Park Road.  To the north the road goes on and to the

title: Park Road

description:
You are at a bend on Park Road.  To the south the road goes on and to the
west is the Road Crossing.
title: Park Road

extras.description: Not the very least comfortable.

An extremely heavy desk.  It is so large that it doesn't even need drawers.
Everything can be stored on its top.

It is an ancient Quifatronic T-1000 mk I.  These machines are known for their
incredible durability, and for their even more incredible weight.  They make
a Cray II look like a laptop.

description:
You are standing in the waiting room at the town hall.  Wooden chairs stand
along the walls and a long desk with a typewriter is placed in the middle of
the room.

easternExit.description: It looks like some kind of office.

title: The Waiting Room

westernExit.description: The exit west leads to Emerald Avenue.

extras.description:
This desk is obviously very old.  Nevertheless it looks as if has never been
used.

This chair is really a masterpiece.  A chair where one can sit as comfortably
as in a bed.  All auditoriums should be equipped with these things.  A shame
that there wouldn't be room for the students too, though.

description:
You are in the not very big office of the Mayor of Midgaard.  A large and
polished but completely empty desk is standing in front of an armchair that
looks so comfortable that it most of all resembles a bed with the head end
raised slightly.
title: The Mayor's Office

westernExit.description: The waiting room is to the west.

description:
You are on Penny Lane.  Emerald Avenue is to the west and Penny Lane
continues in eastward direction.
title: Penny Lane

description: You are on Penny Lane.  The narrow road continues north and west.
title: Penny Lane

description: You are at the end of Penny Lane.  The only exit appears to be south.
title: The End Of Penny Lane

graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.  An iron
grate is to the north.

northernExit.description: Through the solid iron bars you see the Concourse.

southernExit.description: The gravel road continues southward.

title: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard

You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the

through the graveyard and the chapel entrance is to the south.
