by the energy field passing right through its center.
Odd...
title: In The Forest

extras.description:
You can faintly see the woods continue beyond it, but it
seems there's no way through.  The field rises high up
into the air, and seems to form a ceiling above the woods,
preventing a flying entrance.  You'd also bet it extends
deep into the ground.

description:
The magical energy barrier runs straight north-south,
unaffected by dips in the grounds, intervening rocks and
trees, everything.  From the north, you hear a faint
rushing noise above the humming of the field.  The trail
you are on continues to the north and south, only a few
feet away from the barrier it follows.
title: In The Forest

extras.description:
You can see a clearing beyond, the barrier not fully blocking
out the area behind.  You think it might be possible to push
your way through, if the damn thing doesn't kill you first.

description:
Here the field changes color, becoming almost
transparent.  Beyond, you think you can make out a few
shapes, but nothing too terribly distinct.  From the north
comes the rushing sound of water, and through the trees
you believe you can see a river cutting through the
forest.  The trail you are on leads north-south through
the woods, following the energy barrier all along its
length.
title: In The Forest

extras.description:
You can faintly see the woods continue beyond it, but it
seems there's no way through.  The field rises high up
into the air, and seems to form a ceiling above the woods,
preventing a flying entrance.  You'd also bet it extends
deep into the ground.

description:
A river flows through the forest here, its water clean
and clear.  The energy barrier runs right out into the
middle of the river, and then makes another ninety-degree
turn to the west.  The water seems to have no problem
penetrating the magical field, however.
The river seems too wide and too swift to cross here.
It appears the only way to go is back to the south.
title: The River's Edge

description:
The energy barrier seems to push against you
ineffectively as you shove your way through it.  All your
hairs stick up on your body from the static electricity,
and electric shocks sting your body from every metallic
piece of equipment you are carrying.  You think with a
final shove, you can break through to the other side...
title: Just Passing Through...

extras.description:
Demi-human, from the size.  The foreheads slop down to a
blocky brow, and the braincase seems rather small.  On
a hunch, you check one of the feet of a torched body.
Cloven, like a pig's... Orcs.

description:
To the west the magical energy barrier crackles and
hums to itself, almost looking harmless.  Almost -- all
around on the ground are charred corpses and bodies.
Several poles with skulls on top face to the west, warning
travellers on the forest paths away from here.  The air
smells of death and decay, and the air is very still.  You
feel uncomfortable.
title: By The Barrier

extras.description: Cloven hoofs, two feet... they walk erect whatever they are.

description:
Several trails in the forest intersect here in a small
clearing.  The dirt seems matted down, and you see many
footprints in the soil.   Nearby you hear a bird's chirp
abruptly cut off in a loud squawk, and then silence.  The
paths seem well-traveled, the undergrowth matted down and
the foilage hacked away to leave plenty of room or a
traveller to pass in every cardinal direction, excepting
the west path seems fairly overgrown...
You feel watched.
title: A Clearing In The Forest

description:
The northern trail winds through the trees, heading
from a forest clearings to the south to where there appears
to be a river's edge to the north.  This trail appears to
be well-used and you spot many tracks in the earth.  Again
the hairs on the back of your neck stand up, and you wonder
if you're being spied upon.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
A beautiful river flows swiftly by, the current looking
quite dangerous in fact.  Out in the center of the river
you spot the energy barrier enclosure... no way out here.
Looking up, you see a bird fly right through the barrier
overhead and wonder as to the force field's nature.  This
path leads south into the forest, and westwards along the
river's edge.
title: The River's Edge

description:
The river flows on its course, unhampered by the energy
barrier passing right down its center for as far as you
can see in both directions.  The path you are on travels
along the length of the river to the east and west
inbetween the water and the forest's edge.  Once again you
shiver and feel that unmistakeable sense that you are
being watched.  Disturbing.
title: The River's Edge

description:
A large out-cropping of rock blocks this path along the
river to the west, and you don't spot any way around it;
the woods are too thick to the south, the river too swift
to the north, the magical barrier above you.  This is a
nice area, however, as evidenced by the amount of traffic
this path gets.  From the marks in the grass, you guess
that this is a favored resting spot.
title: The River's Edge

description:
This well-used forest trail leads south.  Among the
foot-tracks in the dirt, you spot a few animal tracks as
well, leading you to believe that these trails are used by
hunters.  Why would they be enclosed in this manner,
however?
There is a clearing to the north, and the path
continues to the south.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
This trail leads north-south... obviously a gaming
trail.  The woods, mostly deciduous trees with the
accompanying ground foilage, crowd in to either side.
A shrub to your left shows a fresh cutting wound...
looks like a sharp object like a knife or machete did
the damage.
A crackle in the leaves spins you around, to see
nothing.  Something is watching you, you feel it.
Where?
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The trail changes direction here, turning to the north
and west.  A large tree to your south bears an interesting
artifact; a rusty arrowhead embedded in the wood.  It
looks as if the arrow had been  broken off at the head,
the wood scratched at, and the arrowhead left behind.
Otherwise, there doesn't seem to be much of interest in
this particular section of the woods.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
This is a winding east-west path through the thickening
forest.  The grass along the path is matted down from
frequent traffic.  The path continues to the east, and
there seems to be a small clearing to the west.
A faint noise makes you stand stock still.  You could
have sworn you heard a voice nearby.  Whatever it was, it
wasn't speaking common.
title: A Forest Trail

extras.description: There is dried blood on it.

description:
In the middle of this small clearing in the forest is a
fairly large rock sticking up out of the ground.  Paths
lead away to the east, west, and south from here.  The
trees above block out the sky fairly effectively, also
blotting out the glowing energy barrier above your head.
title: A Small Clearing

description:
A smaller northern path leads away from the main east-
west trail here towards a clearing.  The main path leads
windingly around the trees to the east and west, the woods
blocking out whatever may be ahead.  Again you get that
strange feeling of being watched.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The trail leads east and west here through the forest.
To the west you spot an area where a smaller path breaks
off from the main track.  Eastwards seems to be another
small clearing that seems to be well used; there are many
tracks leading in that direction.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The ground has been cleared of vegetation in this small
clearing, and several large, man-made salt licks lie on
the ground and stand on poles here.  There are many animal
tracks in the earth -- the salt licks must attract
wildlife for miles around.  You think this would be a good
place to hide and wait for dinner if you were a hunter...
title: The Dead End

description:
This trail leads east-west through the forest foilage,
around the trees and up and down the slight rises.  The
area is quiet and serene, except for the energy barrier
keeping you in to the south.  For just a moment, you wonder
if you're still being watched...
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The trail bends here, leading away to the north and
east.  Far off the the distance you hear the squawk of a
large bird-of-prey searching the skies for a meal.  The
ferns around you rustle gently in the light breeze.
Somehow, the threatening aura that pervades over the rest
of the area seems absent here.  You feel almost relaxed...
title: A Forest Trail

description:
A bend in the forest trail allows you to go east and
north here.  To the east you spot a small clearing, while
northwards this trail seems to join a much larger one
leading through the woods.  On the ground is half of a
broken knife handle, made of bone and dried leather,
useless now.  You wonder if the owner is watching you
now -- something certainly is.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
This path leads from the main clearing to the west to
intersect with a north-south path just to the east.  A
small sapling on the north side of the trail has a rope
tied around one of its top branches; an unused snare
evidently.  You still feel as if you're being watched in
the back of your mind, and adrenaline pumps into your
brain like a lightning fuzz.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
A north-south trail leads through the woods here, with
a small side trail leading off to the east.  The trees
provide adequate cover from the sky, but through a few
holes in the foilage you spot the magical barrier above
you, keeping you from escaping by flight.  You feel
slightly captured.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
Two trails come together here, a large northern path
heading away from tracks leading to the east and west.
The western path seems to be the most traveled, and the
east hardly at all.  There seems to be less trees around
here... it seems as if many have been cut down by some
sort of crude tools.  This land clearing appears to be
especially true to the east.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The trees have been cut down around here, and many of
the trunks hollowed out with sharp stones and lined with
treated leather to make almost-waterproof tubs.  A foul
smelling brown fluid, tannin evidently, fills many of
these, soaking into various bits and pieces of animal
hides.  Crude, but workable.
title: A Clearing

description:
The trail is widening to the west, where the path leads
all the way up to the side of the mountains that enclose
this valley.  Many of the trees have been cut down around
here, and it definitely looks as if the forest is ending.
Eastwards the trail leads on into the thick of the forest.
A small split off trail leads away to the south here.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The ground is growing more rocky here.  The trees and
other foilage in the forest grow sparse here, finding it
hard to find purchase in the soil.   The forest ends just
to the west, with the trail you are on leading right on up
to the side of the mountains.  A side trail leads south
here, and the trail also leads back into the thick of the
forest to the east.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The ground is getting very rocky here, causing the
trees of the woods to become more sparse.  Several bushes
have found purchase in the soil, but not near enough to
block free movement in this area.  The trail leads on up
to what appears to be a cave in the side of the mountain
to the west, and a side trail runs along the forest's edge
to the north.  To the east, the trail runs deep into the
forest out of sight.
title: A Rocky Trail

description:
The trail you are on bends around a large double-
trunked tree and leads away to the north and west.  The
green canopy of leaves overhead make this area fairly dark
and ominous, and that creepy 'watched' feeling returns to
hit you with full force.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The trail continues here to the east and west, with a
small trail splitting off towards a large clearing to the
south.  Two wooden poles with skulls on top warn you away
from the south, and succeed in making you feel quite
uncomfortable.  Strange...
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The earth has been upturned many times here, and
several white rocks stick up from the ground in odd
positions.
Graveyard.
This must be where they bury their dead -- just dig a
hole and throw the corpse inside, ignoring any previous
occupants in the ground.  How uncivilized... you hope you
aren't taken care of in this matter when your time
comes...
title: A Large Clearing

description:
The trail splits here, one fork heading north towards
the rushing sounds of a river, and west where the forest
seems to be thinning out a lot.  A sudden motion out of
the corner of your eye catches your eyes, and you turn
your head.  Nothing, there's nothing there at all.
You wonder if you're being stalked.
title: A Forest Trail

description:
The river flows swiftly on its course to the north.
The trail you are on leads on by the water's edge to the
west, and back into the forest to the south.  A large
boulder is just to the west, blocking all travel in that
direction.  Out in the center of the river, the 'roof' of
the energy field meets the northern 'wall'.  The water
passes right on through the magical barrier, however...
the barrier is obviously porous to some materials.
title: A River's Edge

description:
The river pours down the side of the mountains to the
west, originating from a large hole in the face of one of
the sheer rock protuberances.  The energy barrier climbs
right up the mountain, and seals off any means of escape
by that means.  The trail you are on runs by the side of
the river to the east, and a path leads by the forest side
to the south.
title: A River's Edge

description:
The forest is just to your west, with a side trail
leading deep inside from here.  The main trail you are on,
however, heads north towards the river, and south near
where a trail leads up to a cave in the mountain side.
There doesn't seem to be a whole lot to capture your
attention here...
title: A Rocky Trail

description:
You are half blinded by the differences of the outdoors
illumination and the pure darkness of the cave.  A deep,
cloying stench flows out from the cave mouth; the smells
of decay, unwashed bodies, and sickness in one roiling
odor.  Your stomach turns involuntarily, and you wonder
about going back down the hill to the east, instead of
going even further down the western tunnel.
title: A Cave Entrance

extras.description:
They are orcish, and you could swear they were all warning
symbols.

description:
The tunnel forks here, one branch leading north, the
other west.  Additionally, you can head back outside to
the east, which seems like a very good idea to your
tortured nasal passages.  Your eyes water from the stench,
and you clench your left hand tightly to keep control of
your bile.
Forcing your eyes open, you notice the warning signs
painted around the tunnel to the north.
title: A Tunnel Forking

description:
The floor is slick with the humidity that boils out of
the lower reaches of this cave, bringing that most awful
smell with it.  Again, you consider saving your nose the
trip west and down the tunnel, and heading back east to
the cave entrance.
title: A Tunnel

description:
The tunnel takes a deep dip here, and opens up into a
largish cave to the west.  There seems to be a few faint
lights from inside, and you hear some heavy breathing and
low grunts from that direction.  The cave entrance to the
east seems far too far away for your comfort...
title: A Tunnel

description:
Heaps of rotting meat and cups of near-drinkable water
sit here; the orc food stores.  You stand here and wonder
in near-disbelief at how the orcs could find this stuff
palatable.  They're orcs; its their nature and their
stomachs you guess.  Oddly enough, you don't even care to
catalog what they have available -- there's no chance you're
going to take any of this...
title: A Cave

description:
A single corpse lies here, well away from a pile of
similars to the east.  There are several sharpened stakes
and rocks sitting about conveniently.  The way the corpse
is lying, the stone next to its hand... this is a suicide
area!  You look down upon the orc and comprehend its
suffering in its twisted form.  How sad.
title: A Cave

description:
There are bodies here... corpses.  Orcs, the lot of
them, every single one of them horribly disfigured in
some senseless way; one whose arms were removed, another
who lacks anything that could sensibly be called a face.
A few twitch feebly with the last remains of life, the
rest just decompose.  The dim sense of horror budding in
your head blossoms as you realize the pile in the corner
consists of dead orc children awaiting burial.
title: A Cave

description:
A few sleeping pallets, made of moldy straw and
stinking furs are arranged around a small firepit here.
A wooden cup, carved by a crude tool and cruder hands
sits near the ashes filled with water you consider
undrinkable.  Somewhere to the east you hear an orc
child's whining cry, and a voice hushes it urgently.
Beware, orcs!  Adventurers are here!  Hide your children!
title: A Cave

description:
Several grass sleeping pallets are here, clustered
around the remains of an old fire.  The sloping of the
cave's ceiling allow for smoke ventilation towards the
surface in here you note, lucky for the orcs.  A few
strings of burnt meat still hang over the fire, untended
and uneaten.  On the floor near your feet you spy a small,
twisted piece of wire... one orc's idea of a treasured ring,
no doubt.  Kicking the trinket away, you try to push the
pity out of your heart for these wretches.
title: A Cave

description:
You are standing just inside a largish cave, about a
hundred feet in diameter.  A few dim make-shift lanterns
burning animal fat illuminate the area, just enough so you
can see the rotted food on the floor, and a few bodies
sprawled throughout the whole area.  Your disgust quickly
turns to horror as you see a horrible creature, half...
well, half something and half orc dash between two
stalagmites.
title: A Cave

description:
This must be the orc chief's area.  There's an old
prize -- a stolen timeworn human armchair sitting near
the south wall as a throne.  A mammoth sleeping pallet
made of piled furs is nearby.  Next to that is the pile
of orc treasure; a pile of well-polished coppers.  You
look at the pile of worthless coins and wonder at the
image of orcish raiders.
These orcs aren't raiders, they are victims.
title: A Cave

description:
Many sleeping pallets are arranged near the walls, each
made of heavy fur padding for comfort and warmth.  Many
are covered with blood and other, unidentifiable
substances.  Looking around, your only coherent thought
is, 'Don't want to know... don't want to know...'
title: A Cave

description:
This area of the cave is one vast orc sickroom.
Mutated and mangled orcs lie on the floor, seeming quiet,
lifeless.  They're not even worth your time, you think,
unless you've the mercy to put them out of their misery.
You look at the corruption of nature's design and
wonder what forces are at work here... the barrier, the
orcs...  What's going on here?
title: A Cave

description:
This forking off from the mail tunnel seems odd; the
walls are strangely smooth, as if they were carved out by
forces unknown.  The end is abrupt and short, but there is
a steel door inset in the wall of the west side of the
tunnel.  The smell from the lower tunnel doesn't seem
nearly as bad here... this might be a good place to rest
and catch your breath.
title: A Tunnel

westernExit.description:
A large steel door.  There seems to be no hinges or knob,
but there is a small keyhole in the exact center of it.

description:
This section of man-made tunnel heads north from here,
doors on either side.  A few glowing spots on the ceiling
illuminate the area to almost a daylight level.  From the
north you hear some horrible cries of pain and anguish
that make you cringe inside and think twice about heading
in that direction.
title: A Tunnel

westernExit.description: This is a normal, wooden door.

description:
This is a bedroom, catered to someone with a definite
sense of taste.  There's a chest of drawers made of a
solid section of oak tree.  In fact, most of the furniture
here has that 'natural look' about it.  The bed is filled
with soft down with an ornate table lamp close by.  Nice
place.

easternExit.description: A normal, wooden door.

title: A Bedroom

description:
This tunnel opens up into a large room to the north,
and to the south, leads towards a set of doors.  The light
is crisp and bright, clearly showing the lack of tool
marks on the hewn walls... magic?  The room just ahead is
large, and also well-lighted, giving it an almost clinical
atmosphere.  Somewhere in the recesses of that room
something cries out in a horrible crackling voice.  Not
good.
title: A Tunnel

description:
A full fledge operating table is set up here, outfitted
with a full set of restraints.  A ledge nearby has a whole
array of sterile medical equipment on it, covered over by
a clear lid.  There's a drain in the floor with gradients
leading to it to carry away the blood.  For some reason,
you don't imagine this as a voluntary operating theatre...
title: The Laboratory

description:
Another table is set up will all sorts of alchemical
apparatus here, vials and beakers, distillation equipment
and et cetera.  The stuff looks expensive, but bulky and
fragile; not good treasure to cart away with you at all.

easternExit.description: A steel cell door.

title: The Laboratory

description:
This is a small, dirty cage, with only a bucket for
wastes, another bucket for food, and a dirty towel for a
bed.  The whole room has a terrible stench about it.
title: A Cage

westernExit.description: A steel cell door.

description:
Some small cages sit here, containing many different
types of rodents.  Leaning down to look better, you are
very surprised as a tiny, common garden mouse growls at
you and tries to rip your face off through the bars.
There are some bulges on its back, and it doesn't seem to
be in a very good mood.  It quivers some, not fully in
control of its motor functions.  Poor thing.
title: The Laboratory

description:
A rack stands near the cages on the eastern wall,
filled with shackles and manacles, bullwhips and worse.
They all look well-used.  You give a shiver, and carry on.

easternExit.description: A steel cell door.

title: The Laboratory

description:
This is a small, dirty cage, with only a bucket for
wastes, another bucket for food, and a dirty towel for a
bed.  The whole room has a terrible stench about it.
title: A Cage

westernExit.description: A steel cell door.

description:
This is the southwest corner of the lab.  There's no
equipment here, merely several pairs of heavy steel
shackles on the southern wall.  There's also some a few
small bloodstains on the floor beneath the shackles.
title: The Laboratory

description:
This is a fairly roomy laboratory that extends to the
north, with cages set on the east side of the room.  A
metal table here is empty, although you can see some
outlines in the dust that suggest books had laid here
once.

easternExit.description: A steel cell door.

title: The Laboratory

description:
This is a small, dirty cage, with only a bucket for
wastes, another bucket for food, and a dirty towel for a
bed.  The whole room has a terrible stench about it.
title: A Cage

westernExit.description: A steel cell door.

description:
Sticky, sticky, sticky!  The ground is cluttered with leaves,
decayed remains of webbed crickets, beetle, rats, dogs, and even
humans.  You begin to wonder about what lies ahead.  The air is
damp here, and even the little light that shines through the
canopy seems to be absorbed into the webbing.
title: The Webbed Entrance

description:
You find that footing here is very good, almost too good.  The
limbs are coated with cobwebs and seem unusually strong for tree
branches.  Paths lead in four directions.  The eastward path goes
down a bit.
title: The Webby Passage

description:
Drones scuttle about in this room.  The cells on the walls are
honeycomb in shape and many of the maggots and wasps you see have
fang-marks on their bodies.  You sense some order in their markings.
title: The Wasp Hive

description:
Another webby passage, all sticky and wet.  Tiny ballooning
spiders fill the air.  It seems that these young ones are newborns.
title: The Webby Passage

description:
You here the sounds of crawling arachnids above.  The rhythms of
the footsteps suggest a primitive order in there movement.  The light
seems brighter upwards.
title: Beneath The Busy Path

description:
Spiders, spiders, everywhere!  It is almost ant-like in efficiency
with one big difference.  The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses,
as well as rats, wolves, and humans.
title: On The Busy Path

description:
Spiders, spiders, everywhere!  It is almost ant-like in efficiency
with one big difference.  The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses,
as well as cats, wolves, and humans.
title: On The Busy Path

description:
Spiders, spiders, everywhere!  It is almost ant-like in efficiency
with one big difference.  The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses,
as well as cats, dogs, and humans.
title: On The Busy Path

description:
As always, there is a split in the road.  One road is strewn with
cricket feelers.  The other is well-kept and suitable for smooth
travelling.  The webbing that was prevalent in earlier rooms is almost
non-existant now.
title: A Split In The Path

description:
You are on a 'fuzzy' tree limb.  Interesting, since the branches
seem to have 'hairs' sprouting from its bark.  As you look closer
you see millions of aphids covering each limb.
title: A Fuzzy Tree Limb

description:
You feel that you can rest here safely.  There is evidence of
webbing here, but it is of a finer quality.
title: The Tree Trunk

description:
It seems the inhabitant of this place does not web her victims,
as evidenced by the remains before you.  The area is cluttered with
desiccated corpses, apparently bitten but unwebbed, and drained of
their life juices.
title: The Tree Lair Entrance

description:
Very dark, as all lairs of spiders are.  Not much of furnishings
save an exit.  The wolf spider keeps no corpses here, but rather
throws them out at her leisure.
title: The Wolf Spider Lair

description:
Strange.  No webbing here.  In fact, no sounds whatsoever.
The path continues northward, where you find that you may have
to tightrope your way across a ravine.
title: The Webless Path

description:
Stranger still.  Your feet get a real firm grip on the spiderline.
You are above a deep ravine.  This line connects you between two trees.
Below you can see a prismatic web with lots of animal bones caught in it:
some bear and small deer bones in fact.  No human skeletons are visible
(yet).
title: Above The Ravine

description:
The trees here take on a different appearance -- they are not trees
anymore, but disjointed make-shift silken made shafts, sticky to the
touch, and webby in texture.  This is another world it would appear.
title: The Web Forest

description:
You have entered the slave pit.  A voice blares in the distance,
'Get back to work, maggots!'  Rails upon rails of mined gold and silver
clutter the trail beneath you.
title: The Slave Pit

description:
Another tether path just like the rest of them.  Surprisingly
well-lit by the golden orbs that hang from the sides, you can see
the paths become finer and finer in quality.
title: The Tether Path

description: Another shifty little strand of webs, almost ethereal in nature.
title: A Road Crossing

description:
This strand is weightier, more sturdy.  It shimmers as you step on
it.  You are definitely not in the Midgaardian realms anymore.  Just
where you are you can't tell.  It feels like you're moving through
ether.  You can still get back down to more surer lands.
title: A Leader Strand

description:
You are at the entrance to ethereal web.  Flickering in and out,
in and out, each strand reveals a different hue from black to green
to blue.
title: The Entrance Of The Ethereal Web

description:
A playpen of sorts, with maggots of wasps and other baby
vermin lying about.  You feel that humans have been played with
here too, and eaten later.  You sense that the maker of this
place has an appetite for dragon meat, and uses this room as a
breeding area.
title: The Young Wormkin's Crib

description:
Large strands connect at this point.  The node shimmers and
flickers within the ether.  You see many flying creatures --
insects, pegasi, and dragon wormkins -- navigate the dangerous
passages of the web.  Exits go in many directions.
title: The Base Of The Web

description:
This part of the web intersects through the branches of some
trees.  Various leaves and other debris that the many drones have
not picked up yet lie here.
title: Through The Trees

description:
You can see all of Midgaard in this ethereal web.  Many
of the larger dragons that do wish to fly seem to fly away
from the sticky strands of the web.
title: Above The Clouds

description:
This cloud is rather thick in consistency.  You suddenly realize
this is not a typical cloud, but it might be the nest of an aerial
creature.
title: On A Cloud

description:
This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures seem
to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.
title: A Link In The Ethereal Web

description:
Very windy here since it goes up into the sky somewhat.  Still, it
is safe enough to move around.
title: The Tenuous Strand

description:
A more mature wormkin it seems resides here.  Various tomes
of arcane lore clutter the area, along with shards of armor and
weaponry.
title: The Elder Wormkin's Room

description:
Once again the web crosses another tree limb.  To the side you
see the possible entrance to another creature's lair.
title: Another Tree Limb

description:
This is a big game hunter among most spiders.  Crushed
jewels and weapons suggest the inhabitant must have powerful
jaws.  Beware!
title: The Bird Spider's Lair

description:
This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures
seem to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.
title: A Link In The Ethereal Web

description:
This is a quiet tree top.  Downwards you can see a familiar path
that may lead back to Midgaard.
title: The Quiet Tree Top

description:
A wise ki-rin was entrapped here many years ago.  It is from her
that the ruler of this realm draws magical strength.
title: The Ki-Rin Chamber

description:
This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures
seem to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.  To
the north you sense the heavy breathing of a fiery animal.
title: A Link In The Ethereal Web

description:
Yevaud, the Usurper of Midgaard, resides here.  A voice cries
out, 'BEWARE, the Usurper of Midgaard lives here!  FLEE while you can!'
But even Yevaud has his master... or so you deduce.
title: Yevaud's Lair

description:
This is another link in the ethereal web.  Various creatures
seem to get caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands.  A
single spider line lies to the north, while ghastly seemings are
due southward.  The grim entrance of Arachnos' Lair is downward.
title: A Link In The Ethereal Web

description:
A dark path at the end of the web strand, you see ahead
a torch lit chamber where the souls of unavenged adventurers
come and gnash their teeth.  The howls and screams of many
echo through the hall ways.  You see one definite path ahead.
title: The Entrance To The Donjonkeep

extras.description: An ordinary chair, well used, glued to the ground by spiderweb.

description:
A chair sits here for a tireless guardian who ensures that no
soul escapes.  Other than that, the room is undecorated.
title: The Guardian's Room

description:
Here you see many misguided souls who think they still live.
They search for those who killed them without warrant, and seek
the free souls of living beings to inhabit and perhaps adventure
once more.
title: The Realm Of The Hopeless

description:
Here you see many misguided souls who think they still live.
They search for those who killed them without warrant, and seek
the free souls of living beings to inhabit and perhaps adventure
once more.
title: The Realm Of The Hopeless

description:
No souls have ever lived in this place.  The wails of slaves and
the howls of wolves are the only way you can describe the sounds you
hear.  The walls are thin and wispy.  The only light you receive is
the shimmering from the strand of the ethereal web you used to get
here.
title: The Donjonkeep

description:
A single spider line supports you once more.  As you look across
the ether you seen a single shack up ahead with a light in the window.
You sense a great evil coming from the north and feel inclined to go
back on the ethereal web and take your chances there.
title: The Single Spider Line

description:
A single spider line supports you once more.  The shack comes
closer into view and you are even more inclined to go back now.
title: The Single Spider Line

description:
Here you see evidence of a vagrant's abode.  The shack is to the
north, if you dare enter it.  You get the sneaking feeling you should
go back now.  The skies above you darken and roar with the laughter
of thunder.
title: The Hermit's Corner

description:
Mahatma, that silly thief, is here, and he steals everything you
have.  He says 'Here, have a quick trip to the Temple of Midgaard.'
He plunges a black dagger into your back...
title: Mahatma's Inescapable Trap

description:
All strands inevitably lead here, the center of the web, the
entrance to Arachnos' Lair.
title: The Entrance To The Arachnos' Lair

description:
You can still bail out since your knees are shaking from the
anticipation (or is it fear?).  The sky is clear on this strand of
web, surprisingly unsticky.  The strand does not vibrate like the
others.  A few ballooning spiders pass by, cackling 'You're gonna
die, you're gonna fry.  Good bye!'
title: The Sticky Chamber

description:
Before you you see a large, web-like door.  Various designs
of ancient runes and names of Midgaard heroes are etched into
the webwork.  Perhaps lists of victims?  You can't tell.
title: The Great Door

description:
This is the lair of the Empress Spider, Arachnos.  You can
see a lavishly adorned rainbow web, her lair allows her to move
to any universe she wishes by using her magical strands to the
Prime Material Plane.  Coffers upon coffers of gold, magical
jewels and gems await.  Unfortunately Arachnos is a baggy spider
too, and webs all her treasures to her beautiful silken body.
title: The Lair Of Arachnos

description:
This trail leads up, up, up into the mountains.  You
hope you don't fall down, because that would hurt, hurt,
hurt!  The trail continues to the east, and you can go
back down to the small hidden valley to the west.
title: A Mountain Trail

description:
You're really high up now.  You can keep going even
farther up into the mountains to the east, or go back
down to the west.
title: A Mountain Trail

description:
Wispy clouds are beginning to surround you now, and
your ears pop due to the altitude.  To the east, you see
the summit of the mountain, and from the way the nearby
mountains are arranged behind it, you believe you're
on your way to a big valley.  You can also go down
to the west.
title: A Mountain Trail

description:
The peak of this mountain is another couple hundred
feet above you, but here is where the trail leads down
into the valley...  What an odd valley!
The valley seems to have been filled up by a hundreds
of feet of lava many years ago.  It gives the valley an
odd, 'flat' look and darkish ground.  The path leads
down east into the valley, and west back to civilization.
title: Near The Mountain's Peak

description:
The trail leads down into the valley, where, by judging
by the height of the trees, the lava had cooled tens
of decades ago.  Down below you see the path lead into
the small forest in the valley, and disappear out of
sight.  East leads into the valley, West back to civilization.
title: The Trail To The Valley

description:
The ground has taken on the texture of dirt on the top,
but this valley is far too flat and too rocky to disguise
the catastrophe that happened here so long ago.  Looking
up to the mountains ringing this area, you notice several
mountains look as if they had 'exploded', which is strange,
considering that they are not volcanos.
The path leads into the woods to the east, and back up
the mountain to the west.
title: In The Valley

description:
You come to a small clearing now, after walking for several
minutes through the silent woods.  An odd block sticks up
here and there in   the ground... wait a minute.  These
stones seem a little too regular, and from the circle
formation and size you could almost swear that they were...
crenellations?  Could some sort of building been buried
by the lava here?  A rusty ring sticks out of the earth
in the center... a trapdoor?  This is almost too good to
be true!

downwardExit.description: An ancient trapdoor, grimed with earth and age.

title: In A Clearing

description:
This small room is the top of a stairwell leading down
deep into the tower.  A small trapdoor overhead leaks
the light of day around its edges.  To the south is a
wooden door, preserved through the ages by means
unknown.  To the west is a short hall.
title: A Stairwell

upwardExit.description: An ancient trapdoor, grimed with earth and age.

extras.description:
White sheets, pillow-cases, etc.  Not really anything that
you need, but interesting.

description:
This small room holds many types of linen on shelves
along the walls.  They are undoubtedly preserved by
magic against the toil of the ages, since they seem
freshly washed and folded.  You wonder what sort of
mage could wield so much power to waste on such little
things.
title: A Linen Closet

description:
This is only a clean corridor, that leads back to the
stairwell to the east, and has doors leading to other
rooms to the north and south.
title: A Corridor

description:
This is some sort of bathroom, like you've never seen
before...  Water appliances leading from nowhere deliver
hot and cold running water to basins that drain to...
where?  How strange!
title: A Bathroom

extras.description:
The desk is basically uninteresting, as are the papers
on top of it...
Nice clothes, but not your size at all.

description:
This is an opulent room, decorated in silks and gold.
There is an ebony desk against one wall, cooled lava rock
spilling over its surface from the window it once looked
out at.  A nice, spacious closet is filled with clothes
just cleaned and pressed.
title: The Master Bedroom

extras.description: There are lots of books about everything here!

description:
A great mages' library is contained on this floor of
the tower.  You feel you could learn anything you wanted
to if you only looked and read long enough.  A door
opens up back on the stairwell to the east.
title: The Library

westernExit.description: A big bookcase, that looks rather odd.

description:
This stairwell continues up and down, and there is
a door to the west.
title: The Stairwell

description:
This is a small hidden hall with a secret entrance to the
library on the north end of the west wall, and a trapdoor
on the south end.

easternExit.description: The backside of a movable bookcase.

title: A Hidden Hall

description:
This stairwell continues up and down, and there is a door
to the west opening up onto this level.
title: A Stairwell

description: Jackpot!  A small room filled with treasure chests!  Go get them!
title: The Hidden Treasure Room

description:
This hall runs through the tower.  There's more hall to
the west, and doors to your north and south.  A door to
the east leads back to the stairwell.
title: A Hallway

description:
This seems to be a small servant's bedroom, sparsely
decorated and outfitted with a bed, nightstand, chair
and table, etc.  Nothing real important here.
title: A Servant's Room

description:
This seems to be a small servant's bedroom, sparsely
decorated and outfitted with a bed, nightstand, chair
and table, etc.  Nothing real important here.
title: A Servant's Room

description:
This hallway continues to the east, and has a door to
the north.  You could swear that the way this level is
arranged... nah, couldn't be.
title: A Hallway

description:
This seems to be a small servant's bedroom, sparsely
decorated and outfitted with a bed, nightstand, chair
and a table, etc.  Nothing real important here.
title: A Servant's Room

description:
This stairwell leads up and down, and there is a big
open room to your west.
title: The Stairwell

extras.description:
Many of these show scenes of high magic and heroism.
Just like almost every tapestry and painting you've seen.

description:
This is a large dining hall, with a long table that runs
down the length of it.  Chairs are set up along the sides
to accomodate approximately 10 people.  There are paintings
and tapestries on the walls, adding color to the stonework,
The cooled lava that had poured in the windows makes the place
seem eerie somehow .  There is a door to the north, and
the stairwell is to the east.
title: The Dining Hall

description:
This is a well-stocked kitchen, the larders still fresh
and full as if by magic.  Perhaps this would be a good
place to take a break.
title: The Kitchen Area

description:
The stairwell leads up and down here, and there is a hall
you can enter to the west.
title: The Stairwell

extras.description: It is open, empty, and uninteresting.

description:
This area of the tower seems dank and oppressive.  The
hall runs north-south, and there is an empty cell to your
west.  The stairwell is to your east.
title: A Hall

extras.description: It is open, empty, and uninteresting.

description:
This is the northern end of the hall.  There are cells to
your right and left, empty and awaiting occupants.
title: A Hall

extras.description: It is open, empty, and uninteresting.

description:
This is the southern end of the hall.  There are cells to
your right and left, empty and awaiting occupants.
title: A Hall

description:
The stairwell continues up and down here.  A large room
opens up to the west.
title: A Stairwell

extras.description:
Well, one of the papers relate a story about how the mage
of this tower, Rand, angered many kings, and relates how
they set his armies on him.  You wonder if the lava
outside was a failed attempt to destroy the armies...

It is cluttered with all sorts of papers.  Some look
half interesting, actually.

description:
A small desk here is cluttered with magically preserved
papers and documents.  None seem of value, except perhaps
to a historian.  This place seems vaguely uninteresting...
title: A Mage's Office

description:
The stairs go up and down here, and there is a room to the
west...
title: The Stairwell

description:
This is a simply furnished room, with chairs all about.
A fireplace is inset into an inner wall, the chimney
undoubtedly directed by magic...
This would be a nice place to rest awhile...
title: A Sitting Room

description:
This is where the stairwell finally ends.  There is a hall
to your west.
title: The Stairwell

description:
This small hallway on the former 'ground floor' ran north-
south.  To the east is the stairwell that leads up into
the shadowy recesses of the tower.  To the west is the
entrance way to the tower.  The north is completely blocked
off by lava, and the way south is still clear.
title: A Hallway

extras.description: They look nice, but aren't very valuable.

description:
This is a grand chamber with giant double-doors to the
west.  To the east is the main floor of the tower.  This
room is arranged highly attractively and very impressively,
with sculptures and tapistries everywhere.  The doors seem
impenetrable... you don't think you'd be able to get through
them if you really had to...
title: The Entranceway

westernExit.description: These doors seem incredible.  Unfortunately, they're locked.

description:
This was the entrance to the tower.  Now lava has blocked
it up completely.  However:
It seems when the lava came down a man was outside the
doors.  He was blasted into the doors, and died instantly,
but his skeleton still clutches a staff in perfect
condition...

easternExit.description: These double doors have the outline of a man blasted into them...

title: The Doorway

description:
This is the southern part of the hallway.  There is
a door to the west, barred with gleaming bands of lights.
To the north is more hallway.
title: The Hallway

description:
Stairs lead down here into the tower's basement, or you
can head east into the main floor of the tower.
title: The Stairs

description:
Stairs lead up here to the main level, or you can go east
to the basement of the tower.
title: The Stairs

description:
This alcove leads into a huge room to your north, and
to stairs leading down to the east, and stairs going
up to your west.
title: An Alcove

extras.description: Looks like normal, fragile lab equipment to you.
Looks like normal, fragile lab equipment to you.

description:
This laboratory has lots of stuff in it.  Beakers,
flasks, burners, tongs, mortars and pestles, jars filled
with normal things, jars filled with abnormal things, jars
filled with things you'd rather not think about...
A search could reveal many things...
title: The Laboratory

description:
Stairs lead down here to the second level of the basement,
or back west to the alcove.
title: The Stairs

description:
Stairs lead up here to the first level of the basement, or
you can go east to another big room.
title: The Stairs

extras.description:
It is centuries old.  You don't think standing close by
would be a good idea.

You can't see it clearly through the energy field of the
pentagram, but you sense that whatever it is, it is very,
very, very, very angry.

description:
This room is darkly lit by a giant glowing pentagram in
the center of the room.  Bands of force encircle some
sort of being trapped inside.  You think that going
inside would be an EXTREMELY BAD idea...
title: The Summoning Room

description:
The small god entrapped by the wizard looks at you with
an insane expression.  Four hundred years of imprisonment
doesn't do much for one's...

OOPS!

He killed you!
You are dead, R.I.P.
title: Inside A Pentagram

description:
You are walking down a path that leads to the dwarven village.  Above
you, you can see the Turning Point, and to the north the path continues
toward the mountains.

northernExit.description: The path continues.

title: The Path To The Dwarven Village

upwardExit.description: You can see the city of Midgaard.

description:
Now you are at the bottom of a rugged mountain.  The forest around you
is very dense, and it seems very dark to the north.

northernExit.description: The path coninues up the mountain.

southernExit.description: The path heads toward the main city of Midgaard.

title: The Path At The Base Of The Mountain

description:
Standing on the middle of the mountain, you can easily see the city to
the south, and the top of the mountain is very near to the north.

northernExit.description: The top of the mountain is easily seen from here.

southernExit.description: The base of the mountain is near.

title: The Path At The Middle Of The Mountain

description:
You are now on the top of the mountain.  To the south you see a path
leading down the mountain.  To the east and west you see entrances to
what seems like mines.

easternExit.description: An entrance to the mountain which seems to lead underground.

southernExit.description: The path leads down the mountain to the main city of Midgaard.

title: The Top Of The Mountain

westernExit.description: There is an entrance to the mountain.

description:
This is a narrow path leading to the Dwarven Kingdom.  It looks less
travelled than the others, and it is very creepy.  The path opens up to
the south, and continues to the north.
title: The Narrow Path

description:
Here is an entrance to the mountain.  The door looks very well built,
and you can hear noise coming from within.
title: The Entrance To The Mountain

extras.description: They hang over the road in the most ominous of ways.

description:
This is a narrow path that bends to the east here.  The trees hang
over the path, and it is very overgrown.  The narrow path continues to
the south and to the east.
title: A Bend In The Narrow Path

description: This path is very narrow, and it continues to the north and west.
title: The Narrow Path

description:
This path leads to the north and south.  To the north you can see a
door, and to the south the path continues.
title: The Narrow North-South Path

description:
Here the path turns to the west.  You can see a door in front of you,
and the path continues to the west and south.
title: The Door To The Kingdom

description:
You are on a path that will eventually lead to the castle.  It
continues north to the castle, and there is a door in the southern
wall.
title: On The Path To The Castle

description:
You are still on the path to the castle, or back to the Dwarven
village, whichever way you wish to go.  The path continues to the
north and south.
title: Still On The Path To The Castle

description:
Here there is a door to the castle to the east.  The castle is
elegantly designed, and looks much like a roll of toilet paper
standing  on its end.  There is a sign which says:

******************************************
*  WELCOME TO THE CASTLE OF STRANGELOVE  *
*      Here, celibacy is uninvited       *
******************************************
title: The Door To The Castle

description:
Everything here is covered in soot and very grimy.  The path continues
to the east and north, and there is a door to the west.

easternExit.description: The path leads outside the entrance.

northernExit.description: The little underground path continues to the north.

title: Inside The Entrance

westernExit.description: This looks like an entrance to some type of store room.

description:
You are on a path in the dwarven village which leads north to the shops
and south to the corner of the area.
title: The Path

description:
You are on a path that leads to the Hide & Tooth shop to the west, and
the path continues to the south.
title: A Turn In The Road

westernExit.description: The Hide & Tooth shop can be seen to the west.

description:
You are in the Hide & Tooth shop.  Here you may buy the finest in Dwarven
weapons and armors.  The path continues to the north and east.
title: The Hide & Tooth Shop

description:
You are on a path to the north of the Hide & Tooth shop.  The path
continues to the north, and there is Granite Head's bakery to the west.
title: The Path To The North Of The Shop

description:
Here the path bends to the east towards the barracks. To the south
you can see the shops.
title: North Of The Shops

description:
Here the path passes by the Hospital to the north.  It continues
to the east to the barracks, and to the west.
title: A Path By The Hospital

description: Here the path continues west, and east to the barracks.
title: A Path Next To The Barracks

description:
Here there is an entrance to the barracks to the south, and the path
continues to the west.
title: The Entrance To The Barracks

extras.description: There is a wall poster of a nude Minne Pearl.

description:
You are in the guard house to the west of the entrance to the castle.
There are nudie posters covering the walls.
title: A Guard House

description:
Here is the first of two main rooms of barracks.  The barracks
continue to the south, and you can leave the room to the north.
title: The First Barrack Room

description:
Here is the back of the dwarven barracks.  There are rows of beds
here, and there is a stench that is unbearable.
title: The Back Of The Barracks

description:
You are just inside the castle.  It is very tubular in shape,
and it is very featureless.  There is a set of stairs that lead
up, and the door leads out of the castle to the west.
title: Inside Of Castle Strangelove

extras.description: After blowing all the dust off the floor, you notice a trapdoor!

description:
There is a layer of dust on the floor at least 3 inches thick!  It is
probable that not many people have been in here for many months.

downwardExit.description: After blowing all the dust off the floor, you notice a trapdoor!

easternExit.description: A lighted area that looks like a well worn path.

title: A Store Room

description:
This room smells like wine, and you can only assume it used to be
a wine cellar at one time.
title: The Wine Cellar

description: The stairs continue to circle up and down here.
title: On The Stairs In Castle Strangelove

description:
You are still circling around on the stairs.  You are starting to
get dizzy from going around and around and around and around and
around.  The stairs continue up and down.
title: On The Stairs

description:
You are at the top of the stairs in the castle.  There is an exit
to the east, and the stairs lead down.
title: At The Top Of The Stairs

description:
This is the Queen's waiting room.  Here the men literally
'wait' for the queen.  You've heard that the queen really
likes to get to 'know' her people, in the biblical sense.
The Queen's bedroom is to the north, and you can see stairs
to the west.
title: The Queen's Waiting Room

description:
This is the Queen's bedroom.  The bed is all ruffled, and there
is a stack of dirty sheets piled in the corner.  There is a ladder
that leads down, out of the castle, and you can leave the room
to the south.  There is also a small wooden door to the west.
There is a sign that says:

-------------------------
|  I'm busy right now,  |
|  and don't know when  |
|  Ill be back, but if  |
|  there is a key here  |
|  take it and PLEASE,  |
|  try to get my birth  |
|  control pills back!  |
|  I've heard they can  |
|  be found somewhere,  |
|  deep in the mines..  |
-------------------------
title: The Queen's Bedroom

description:
You are standing on the north side of Castle Strangelove.  You
notice that you are no longer inside the mountain anymore either.
Along the southern horizon you see towering mountains.
The only exit, however, is back up the ladder into the Queen's
Bedroom.
title: The North Side Of Castle Strangelove

description:
You are inside the Dwarven Hospital.  It smells like rubbing
alcohol, and there is blood all over the walls.
title: The Hospital

description:
The aroma coming from this room is astonishing.  You can almost taste
the pastries dissolving in your mouth.
title: Granite Head's Bakery

description:
This path is very well worn, and there is an entrance to the mines to the
east, while the path continues to the north and west.
title: The Dark Path

description:
The little path here leads down toward the mines, while the worn path
continues to the west.
title: The Mine Entrance

description:
You are at the bottom of the mineshaft.  The air here is very sooty, and
it is very hard to breath.  The mineshaft leads up and east.
title: At The Bottom Of The Mineshaft

description:
You are deep inside the mine, and you feel very uncomfortable.  The
path continues to the east, and leads to the mineshaft to the west.
title: On The Path Inside The Mine

description:
You are at a crossroad in the mine.  There is a door to the north,
and the path continues to the south, east, and west.
title: The Mine Crossroad

description:
You are inside the storage area for the raw materials that are
found down here.  The room is very unsturdy as the supports are
very rickety.
title: The Coal Room

description:
You have entered the maze of the mines.  To the east you can see
some inscriptions, and you can exit to the south.
title: The Mine Maze

description:
You are inside the maze, but not far enough in that you could
get lost.  There is an enscription on the wall which says:

1    3    2    4
N    W    N    S

This isn't too tough, so don't take it so rough.
title: At The Maze Inscription

description: You are in a maze.
title: The Maze

description: You are in a maze.
title: The Maze

description: You are in a maze.
title: The Maze

description:
This is the storage room for equipment used by the Dwarven miners.
It is very small, and you can tell that not many miners actually use
equipment.
title: The Mining Equipment Room

description:
You have solved the maze.  You can tell by the last few moves
that there is no way that a dumb worker could have figured that
out.  It seems pretty desolate here.  To the south is a bleak
room.  To the north, you see the maze.  There is a sign above
the south exit:

THOSE WHO ENTER, PLAN ON A TIMELY DEATH.
(ESPECIALLY IF YOU'RE LOYAL TO THE QUEEN)
title: The End Of The Maze

description:
You have entered the Mazekeeper's room.  There are pictures of
the Queen with darts thrown at it.  Spraypainted on the wall are
things like 'the queen shall suffer' and 'Catholics Rule'.
title: The Mazekeeper's Room

description:
This room appears to be the Queen's Treasury.  There is one
exit, back to the east.
title: The Treasury

description:
This is a small fissure in the solid rock.  Under you lies the deep dark
pool.  The water trickles quietly down from the ledge above you.  The water
smells like the water in a sewer.

downwardExit.description: The water's edge.

title: The Fissure Under The Ledge

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You are standing in mud to your knees.  This is not the kind of place
for a picnic.  The muddy sewer stretches further into the south.

southernExit.description: You see the muddy sewer continuing into the darkness to the south.

title: The Muddy Sewer

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the south.  It looks as if
no person has ever put his foot here before.  It is too muddy for that
anyway.  The sewer leads north, south and east from here.

easternExit.description: East.  The muddy sewer leads into a bend that goes south.

northernExit.description: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the north.

southernExit.description: South.  The muddy sewer ends in a mudhole that way.

title: The Muddy Sewer Junction

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You stand in mud all the way up to your thighs and it is not too
comfortable since you are used to a somewhat different environment.
The sewer leads to the north of here.  In the middle you can just
make out an enormous drainpipe leading down.

downwardExit.description: The muddy drainpipe leads down through the mud, otherwise it is utterly dark.

northernExit.description: North.  The muddy junction lies in that direction.

title: The Mudhole

description:
You are standing by the edge of a dark pit that leads down into even
deeper darkness.  >BWWAAADDRR< - The smell from down there is unbearable.
The sewer stretches into the darkness to the east.

downwardExit.description:
The Dark Pit leads down and down and down... well you can't see the
bottom anyway.  There are bars that could function as a ladder on
the side.

easternExit.description: East.  The sewer leads into the sewer junction.

title: The Dark Pit

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You are standing in the middle of a bend of the sewer pipe.  It is very
dark around here and the mud is sticking to your legs, not very pleasant.
The pipe leads east and south from here.

easternExit.description: East.  The mud stretches on into the darkness.

southernExit.description:
South.  There is even more mud in that direction than where you are now.
Incredible.

title: The Muddy Sewer

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You are standing in something that reminds you very much of porridge,
this has the advantage that it is not hot, it is rather cold actually.
The pipe bends to the north and east.

easternExit.description:
The pipe leads into a bend that goes south.  Interesting, there is mud on
the ground there as well.

northernExit.description: The muddy sewer pipe leads into a bend that goes east.

title: The Muddy Sewer

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
This isn't your idea of a place to stay too long.  You're in up to
your knees in something that resembles mud, but you're not quite sure.
The bend in which you stand leads west and south.

southernExit.description:
The pipe leads into a intersection that goes south and east.  The floor here
is still covered in mud.

title: The Muddy Sewer Bend

westernExit.description:
The pipe (still filled with mud) leads into a intersection that goes north
and south.  Interesting.

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You have both your feet safely stuck in mud.  It isn't the mud that is
wrong it is the smell, the sounds, the total darkness that surrounds you.
Everything here is so depressing.  The pipe leads on with a trail of thick
mud to the north, east and south.

easternExit.description:
East.  This way looks like a place for the annual mud festival, although the
stench wouldn't allow any happiness at all.  The pipe leads into a bend that
leads north.

northernExit.description:
North.  The pipe goes into a bend with a load of mud all the way up the walls.
The bend leads west.

southernExit.description:
South.  There is much less mud in that direction.  Your light doesn't
uncover enough space for you to see much more than that it leads into
some sort of junction.

title: A Muddy Intersection

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You stand in the middle of a huge junction of sewer pipes right under
what you'd think was an air shaft.  The sewer pipes lead to the north,
south, east and west.  It look quite impossible to force your way up.

easternExit.description: YYEEUUCH!  BOOH!  THAT looks like a nice place for creepy crawlies.

northernExit.description: North.  Mud is the floor basis in that direction.  Yummy.

southernExit.description:
South.  This direction looks quite nice actually.  The pipe leads into
a bend that goes east.

title: The Sewer Junction

westernExit.description:
A few yards ahead - away from this junction - there is a pit leading down,
but the smell from there...>PHEWW<.

description:
You are in a bend in the sewer pipe.  A strong smell seeps in from the
north.  The sewer goes north and east.

easternExit.description: East.  The Pipe leads into utter darkness that way.

northernExit.description: North.  You are staring into a huge junction with exits in all directions.

title: A Bend In The Sewer Pipe

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You have entered a kind of tube intersection that leads south, west
and east.  Your legs are covered in mud up to the knees.  REAL yucky!

easternExit.description: East.  There is less mud in that direction, or that's your impression.

southernExit.description:
That way is lost in darkness, though you sense less mud in that direction,
perhaps even a complete end to this sludge that surrounds you.

title: The Muddy Sewer Pipe

westernExit.description: West.  The mud reaches that way too, all the way up the walls.

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
This is not your idea of a holiday.  You stand in mud up to your knees.
It is absolutely inconceivable how all this mud could have been placed
here.  The pipe leads to the west and south.

southernExit.description:
South.  There is even more mud that way, incredible!  Although it looks
like an intersection in the sewer system that leads east and south.

title: The Bend In The Muddy Sewer

westernExit.description:
West.  All you can see, is that the pipe leads into a bend that goes
north.  But there is less mud in that direction, however odd that sounds.

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

It is NOT the kind of matter that would concern you too much, normally, but
as you are in the middle of it, it just might become your main concern.
REAL YUCKY!

description:
You wouldn't want to know the true feeling of standing in this mud up to
your hips.  >BWAADR<.  All that fills your mind right now is the dream of
a hot bath.  This is NOT very clean mud you know, remember you're in the
sewer!  The pipes leads north, south and east.

easternExit.description:
East.  You can see absolutely nothing of interest in that direction (Maybe
that is why it is so damn interesting...)  There is no mud in that direction
either, GREAT!

northernExit.description:
North.  Sludge and sediment fills this corridor of the sewer that leads
into a bend going west.

southernExit.description:
South.  All you can see is more mud!  Although the pipe goes into a bend
leading west.

title: A Muddy Intersection

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
You stand in a bend of the pipe system of the sewer with mud up to your
thighs.  Contemplating a higher level of existence here would be utterly
inappropriate, as the smell would keep any intelligent creature from even
thinking of anything but getting away from this foul end of the WORLD.
The bend goes from north to west.

northernExit.description:
North.  Filled with mud, that place looks like an impassable intersection
with pipes leading north and east.

title: The Muddy Sewer

westernExit.description:
West.  There is less mud that way, maybe you're on your way out of this foul
place.

extras.description:
These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe, but perhaps safe
enough for you to climb down, WITH both hands on them.

description:
You are standing by an old and worn well from before this century.  The
sewer leads to the east from here and the well leads down into darkness.
Metal bars implanted in the side of the well lead down as a ladder.

downwardExit.description:
Down the well there is even less light than up here, so... sorry, you can't
see a thing.  There are metal bars in the side leading down into the darkness.

easternExit.description:
East.  You see, because of the utter darkness that surround you, absolutely
nothing.  Your light isn't of much use for that kind of distance.

title: The Old Well

description:
You are in the middle of a bend in the pipe system of the sewer system,
WHAT a place!!!  The pipe leads to the south and the east.

easternExit.description:
East.  What a quiet place you've found there.  It is an intersection that has
pipeways going north and east.

southernExit.description: South.  You see nothing at all in that direction it is too dark anyway.

title: The Ordinary Bend

description: You are in a junction that leads north, west and south.

northernExit.description: North.  You see a bend.

southernExit.description:
South.  It looks like a pipe junction just like this one.  Only that one
leads east and west.

title: The Sewer Junction

westernExit.description: West.  There is a junction with four pipelines in that direction.

description:
This looks like an ordinary junction, actually it seems very quiet
here.  The pipelines lead west, east and north.

easternExit.description:
To the east there is nothing of particular interest, though there is a
junction with pipelines leading north and east.

northernExit.description: To the north you can see a junction like this one, leading north and west.

title: The Ordinary Junction

westernExit.description: There is a bend to the west leading north.

description:
This is the kind of place to rest, though the smell could be a LOT
better than this.  The sewer goes east, north and west from here.

easternExit.description: There is an ordinary junction in the pipe system to the east.

northernExit.description: In that direction, you can't see anything.  It is just too dark.

title: A Quiet Pipe Junction

westernExit.description:
West.  There is an ordinary bend leading south into the sewer system in
that direction.

description:
As you enter you hear a loud click from one of the walls... and you fall
and fall and fall...
.
.
.
.
... And come to an abrupt end.  THIS is strange indeed.  There is an arched
entryway leading down.

downwardExit.description:
Down.  It is utterly dark that way, though you can make out an intersection
of sewer pipes leading west, north and east.

title: The Odd Room With Smooth Walls

description:
You are standing in mud up to your ankles.  This is an intersection with
sewer pipes leading east, south and west.

easternExit.description: To the east there is a peculiar looking round room.

southernExit.description: To the south there is another intersection with pipes going south and east.

title: The Sewer

westernExit.description:
To the west there is another intersection like this one, with sewer pipes
leading south and west.

description:
You have never seen anything so BORING... This is an intersection with
pipes leading north, south and east.

easternExit.description:
East.  You see nothing of interest in that direction, just another
intersection.  This one leads east and south.

northernExit.description:
To the north there is an intersection, where the pipes are leading west and
east.  You notice that the floor to the west is covered in mud.

southernExit.description: Another intersection lies to the south.  It leads west and south.

title: Another Intersection

extras.description:
It is as dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of
that, the smell is absolutely overwhelming.

description:
This one seems interesting, a big difference from all the other junctions.
It seems cleaner than the rest of them.  Weird.  Something that looks like
an air shaft leads upwards, but it looks far too slippery to climb.
The pipes lead to the south, west and north.

northernExit.description: North.  You see an intersection there, leading north and east.

southernExit.description: To the south there is ANOTHER junction leading west and east.

title: A Junction

westernExit.description:
To the west you see a load of mud and sediment in the sewer.  That should
be an intersection there but you're not quite sure.

description: You stand in a junction of sewer pipes leading north, east and west.

easternExit.description: To the east you can see a bend in the pipe going south.

title: The Sewer Junction

westernExit.description: To the west you can just make out an old well.

description:
You stand in the middle of a huge junction of concrete sewer pipes.  The
pipes lead into three different directions: east, south and west.

easternExit.description: East.  You can see a bend in the sewer pipe leading north.

southernExit.description:
To the south there is an ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.

title: The Triple Junction

westernExit.description:
To the west you can just make out another junction similar to the one
you are standing in.

extras.description:
It looks as if it is made of stainless steel, and it would function
as a club of considerable power, but alas... You can't take at all
since it is firmly set into the concrete wall.

description:
You are standing in something that reminds you of an entry to an ant hive.
There are enormous concrete pipes leading north, south, east and west.
There is also a metal ladder built into the concrete wall leading up through
a layer of garbage.

easternExit.description: East.  You can see a pit in the floor.

northernExit.description:
To the north you can see a huge triple junction with sewer pipes leading
west and east.

southernExit.description: To the south there is a huge junction with pipes leading east and west.

title: The Quadruple Junction Under The Dump

upwardExit.description:
Up through the garbage you can just make out what looks like the dump in
Midgaard.

westernExit.description: To the west there is an odd looking room with totally smooth walls.

description: You stand in a junction with pipes leading west, north and east.

easternExit.description: East.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and east.

northernExit.description:
To the north there is an ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.

title: A Triple Junction

westernExit.description: West.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

description: You can look in two directions where the pipe leads: south and west.

southernExit.description: To the south you can see another bend leading west.

title: A Bend In The Sewer Pipe

westernExit.description: West.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

description:
You can look in two different directions where the pipe goes: west and
north.

northernExit.description: North.  You see another bend leading west.

title: The Sewer Pipe Bend

westernExit.description:
You can see another junction although this one is a triple one with pipes
going south and west.

description:
You stand in a section of a pipe that leads to a dead end.  In the floor
there is a pit leading down.  There are bars set in the side of the pit
wall functioning as a ladder.

downwardExit.description: Down the pit it is so utterly dark that you can't see a thing.

title: The Pit

westernExit.description: West.  You can see a dimly lit quadruple junction with an exit up.

description:
As you enter the room it starts rotating - at first slowly, then faster
and faster - You get totally confused as to where up and down is, but
you are certain that the doorway is in the opposite direction of what
it was when you entered.  It now leads east.  There is only this one
exit.

easternExit.description: You can just make out a smaller room with a chair.

title: The Round Room

description: You are standing in a junction of pipes that lead west, east and south.

easternExit.description: East.  You can make out a dimly lit Guard Room.

southernExit.description: To the south you can see what looks like a store room.

title: The Three Way Junction

westernExit.description: West.  You see another junction similar to this one leading north and south.

description:
You stand in a small room lit by a single torch set in the wall.  The only
way out of here is to the north.

northernExit.description: To the north you see a pipe junction.

title: The Sewer Store Room

extras.description:
Firmly set into the wall of the shaft it is impossible to even move, in your
estimate.

description:
You are standing by the edge of a deep, dark shaft leading down.  A single
ladder is your tool to work your way down if you so wish.  The sewer pipe
leads south from here.

downwardExit.description:
Down and utter darkness.  There is absolutely nothing to be seen in that
direction.

southernExit.description: To the south you can see the pipe leading further south into darkness.

title: The Shaft

description:
You stand in the middle of a pipe that leads from north to south.  Above
you an air shaft leads up into sunlight.  It seems totally impossible to go
up that way.

northernExit.description: To the north you can just make out a huge shaft leading down.

southernExit.description: To the south you can see a triple junction leading west and east.

title: The Sewer Entrance

description:
You are in a passageway in the pipes of the sewer system leading north,
east and west.

northernExit.description: You see a sewer pipe leading north.

title: The Junction Going Three Ways

westernExit.description:
West.  You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north
and west.

description:
You are standing in a large room with chairs set in the walls.  You have
the feeling of being watched.  To the south there is an entrance to a
larger room.  The room is lit by five torches, also set in the walls.  To
the west there is a doorway leading out to the sewers.

southernExit.description: You can see an even larger room than this one, filled with light.

title: The Sewer Room

westernExit.description: To the west you can see the sewers.

description:
This is a Room with walls that glitters like gold though not quite like
it. This is strange as it looks as if the glitter lights the whole room.
It looks very bright.  To the south the floor is covered with yucky water.
The north leads to a sort of a guard room.

northernExit.description: To the north you can see the guard room.

southernExit.description: To the south there is nothing but water and an exit leads east from there.

title: The Sewer Room

description:
You stand in water to your waist.  To the north is the entrance to this
room.  A single door leads east.

easternExit.description: You can see an enormous hall through the doorway.

northernExit.description: To the north you see the entrance to this room.

title: The Pool In The Sewer

description:
You stand in a dead end of the sewer.  The only way out is south.
You can see a shaft leading up but it looks too difficult to go up
that way.
title: The Sewers

description: You stand in a junction leading north, west and east.

easternExit.description:
Darkness has closed in on that part of the sewer system, you can't see
a thing in that direction.

title: The Junction

westernExit.description:
West.  You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north
and west.

description:
The only thing in this room of interest is a chair, and that appears
to have been bolted to the rock floor.  A doorway leads south and another
leads east into darkness.

easternExit.description: Utter darkness...

southernExit.description: You can see a room with a lot of light in it.  You can't make out any details.

title: The Small Room

description:
You are in what reminds you of a foul sewer, as if you liked being here!
You can see two exits leading either north or south.
