southernExit.description: To the south you can see a strange light flowing from there.

title: The Sewer Pipe

description:
You are in a grand sewer pipe.  This stretches toward the south.  It is
large indeed!  A doorway leads to the east from here.

easternExit.description: You can't see anything in that darkness.

northernExit.description: To the north you can see a doorway.

southernExit.description: In the south end of the pipe the "floor" is completely covered with water.

title: The Grand Sewer

description:
You stand in water to your knees.  A doorway leads west from here.  The
pipe stretches north.

northernExit.description: You see a lot of pictures decorating the walls.

title: The South End Of The Grand Pipe

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You stand in a room where half of the floor is covered in water.  The
water leads east and a doorway leads west.

easternExit.description:
You can hardly make out much more than that the next place is in a pipe
with more water.

title: The Edge Of The Water Sewer

description:
You can't see much of this, even with a light.  The hallway goes into a
passageway to the south.  A doorway leads west.

southernExit.description: You can see nothing at all because it is completely dark in that direction.

title: The Dark Hallway

westernExit.description: You see a lot of light, bright as daylight, but nothing of interest.

description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet.  The
passageway seems to continue south and north.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

title: The Dark Passageway

description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet.  The
passageway seems to continue south and north.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

title: The Dark Passageway

description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet.  The
passageway seems to continue south and north.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

title: The Dark Passageway

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet.
The passageway seems to continue west and north.  To the east there
is water covering the floor and that leads through an arched entry
to a watery sewer.

easternExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

title: The Dark Passageway

westernExit.description: You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips.  The sewer
seems to bend and lead south and west.

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

title: The Watery Sewer Bend

westernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips.  The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

title: The Watery Sewer

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips.  The sewer
seems to lead into a junction going south, north and east.

easternExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

title: The Watery Sewer

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips.  The sewer
seems to lead into a junction that goes north, south and east.

easternExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

title: The Watery Sewer Junction

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

southernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

title: The Watery Sewer

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips.  The sewer
seems to bend and lead west and north.

northernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

title: The Watery Sewer Bend

westernExit.description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there is quite a drop
down.  You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness,
mostly because of the trickling of water.  The water from the sewer actually
washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery.  From here it drops,
like a waterfall, into the pool far down.

southernExit.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

title: A Ledge By A Dark Pool

westernExit.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

extras.description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description:
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there is quite a drop
down.  You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness,
mostly because of the trickling of water.  The water from the sewer actually
washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery.  From here it drops,
like a waterfall, into the pool far down.  Under you there is a small fissure
in the rock.  It seems big enough to contain a few people.

northernExit.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

title: A Ledge By A Dark Pool

westernExit.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

description:
The pool side is dimly lit up by your light.  You can see absolutely
nothing else nearby.  The darkness her seems enormously oppressive here.
The air is damp and the rock on which you stand is slippery.  The pool
seems too dark to make anything clear.  The pool seems to extend to the
east.  The rock can be climbed upwards from here.

easternExit.description:
The pool extends eastwards, but you cannot find enough room to move in that
direction.

title: The Edge Of The Water

extras.description: You never saw such disgusting matter before, it nearly makes you puke.

description:
You stand in a small room with a great big opening in the ceiling.  From
this opening there is mud dripping down in large lumps.  >YUCK<.  You can
smell the foul stench of the slimy sediment as you try not to get covered
by the falling sludge.  To the east there is an entryway leading out from
here and it seems absolutely impossible to force the muddy descent.

easternExit.description: East.  You see nothing of interest.

title: Under The Mudhole

extras.description:
This is funny enough a wooden ladder and, after closer inspection, you
discover it is magically held to the wall!  You can't, even with your
greatest effort, move it at ALL!

description:
Nice place you found yourself in.  You stand in the middle of a room
with only two exits, up and east.  A tall ladder has been left here so
that you can climb up through the pit without the use of a rope.
title: Under The Dark Pit

upwardExit.description: Up.  You can't see a thing up there, it is way too dark.

extras.description: You never saw such disgusting matter before, it nearly makes you puke.

description:
You are standing in what looks like a bend in the pipe system of the
sewer.  The 'floor' is covered completely by mud!  This includes covering
your legs up to your knees as well.  The pipe leads west and south.

southernExit.description:
To the south there is less mud than here!  It actually seems to end there!
You have a felling it would be nice to have your feet free from mud again.

title: A Muddy Bend In The Sewer System

westernExit.description:
You can see a room in which mud drips from the roof onto the floor in
great cakes of sludge.  There doesn't seem to be any exits from that room
apart from in you direction.

description:
You stand in the middle of what looks like a triple junction of pipes
going east, west and north.

easternExit.description: East.  You can't even make out what it might look like, it is just too dark.

northernExit.description: You can see a mud area starting in that direction.

title: A Junction In The Sewer Pipes

westernExit.description: West.  There is a room with a ladder leading up.

extras.description:
These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe, but perhaps safe
enough for you to climb down, WITH both hands on them.

description:
You are dangling on the slippery sides of the old well leading down and
up.  The only secure point here is the metal bars that are cemented into the
sides, the ones that you cling frantically to so that you don't fall.  Who
knows how deep this well is?  The bars lead down and up and nowhere else.

downwardExit.description:
Down there nothing at all can be spotted.  The darkness that engulfs this
decent seems utterly impossible in a mortal world.  It is so thick that a
torch down there would be utterly useless... or so it seems to you.  Not
the kind of thing to cheer you up on this voyage, Eh?

title: Down The Old Well

upwardExit.description:
There is a slight, dim light from above, or maybe it is just your imagination.
Anyway it SEEMS darker down here than up there, if that is possible.

extras.description:
This is truly a weird piece of craftsmanship in your eyes.  The edge seems to
form a step leading down, but WHAT a STEP DOWN.  The Abyss opens down there
leading to seemingly total destruction.

A small rock sticks out right under it, otherwise the way is DOWN, DOWN, and
SPLAT!!!

It looks as if it can be opened in a door-like fashion.  Maybe this will lead
the way down.

description:
You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of
safe, solid ledge under your feet.  The ledge continues to the east but not
back south.  It seems that the ledge is too narrow to turn on so you'll have
to continue forward.

downwardExit.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

easternExit.description: The ledge continues east.

southernExit.description: The ledge continues south.

title: The Northwestern Corner Of The Ledge

description:
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since
there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards.

easternExit.description:
You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but
darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling an utterly unknown distance.

northernExit.description: North.  The ledge leads into a corner and turns eastward.

southernExit.description: South.  The ledge leads further south into utter darkness.

title: The Narrow Ledge

description:
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since
there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards.

easternExit.description:
You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but
darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

northernExit.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

southernExit.description: The ledge continues further south into darkness.

title: The Narrow Ledge

description:
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since
there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards.

easternExit.description:

northernExit.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

southernExit.description: The ledge continues south into darkness.

title: The Narrow Ledge

description:

there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards.

easternExit.description:
You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but
darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

northernExit.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

southernExit.description: South.  You can just make out the south-western corner of this ledge.

title: The Narrow Ledge

extras.description:
This is truly a weird piece of craftsmanship in your eyes.  The edge seems to
form a step leading down, but WHAT a STEP DOWN.  The Abyss opens down there
leading to seemingly total destruction.

A small rock sticks out right under it, otherwise the way is DOWN, DOWN, and
SPLAT!!!

It looks as if it can be opened in a door-like fashion.  Maybe this will lead
the way down.

description:
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to
the north of here.  The ledge seems to lead around some sort of Abyss of
total darkness.  The ledge seems to have an odd-looking edge here.

downwardExit.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

easternExit.description: You see a broad ledge leading eastward.

northernExit.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

southernExit.description: South of here is the exit from the ledge.

title: The Southwestern Corner Of The Ledge

description:
You stand in a rather odd intersection of pipes.  The pipes actually
don't resemble pipes anymore.  They look more like a real stone tunnel,
or a passageway hewn directly into the rock.  The ways from here lead
north, east and west.

northernExit.description: North.  You see a ledge to something that looks like an abyss.

title: An Odd Intersection

description:
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since
there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards.

easternExit.description: The ledge leads further east.

southernExit.description:
You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but
darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

title: The Narrow Ledge Going East To West

description:
You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of
CircleMUD.  The result of such a foolish act should be punished with
death, you know.  With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 meters
per second squared, you are now descending the Abyss.  What awaits you
at the bottom will continue to be a mystery.  Good-bye cruel world.
title: Mid-Air

description:
You are standing on a ledge that seems quite a lot larger than the
rest of the ledges.  This one leads to the west and the east, plus it
has an exit going to the south.  Though you could jump into mid-air,
but it probably wouldn't be such a good idea.  The way south is in
utter darkness.
title: The Broad Ledge

extras.description:
The ground here seems a little different from all the other ledges along the
Abyss.  There is a kind of soft soil on this ledge, maybe you should look
carefully at this.  It seems to be of some interest.

You can just make out the outline of a trapdoor here in the soil.  The earth
is probably there to conceal a secret entrance.  This looks as if it leads
down into the seemingly solid rock face of the ledge.

description:
You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of
safe, solid ledge under your feet.  The ledge continues to the west and
leads south from here into darkness.

downwardExit.description:
You can just make out the outline of a trapdoor here in the soil.  The earth
is probably there to conceal a secret entrance.  This looks as if it leads
down into the seemingly solid rock face of the ledge.

title: The Northeastern Corner Of The Ledge

westernExit.description: The ledge continues west.

description:
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since
there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards.  And THAT is west of here
so watch your step.

southernExit.description: The ledge leads further south.

title: The Narrow Eastern Ledge

westernExit.description:
You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but
darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

westernExit.description:

description:
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since
there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards.  And THAT is west of here
so watch your step.  You also see a small opening to the east.

easternExit.description: East.  You stare into darkness.

southernExit.description: The ledge leads further south.

title: The Narrow Eastern Ledge

westernExit.description:
You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but
darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

extras.description:
This is truly a weird piece of craftsmanship in your eyes.  The edge seems to
form a step leading down, but WHAT a STEP DOWN.  The Abyss opens down there
leading to seemingly total destruction.

A small rock sticks out right under it, otherwise the way is DOWN, DOWN, and
SPLAT!!!

It looks as if it can be opened in a door-like fashion.  Maybe this will lead

description:
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the
north of here.  The ledge seems to lead around some sort of abyss of total
darkness.

downwardExit.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

northernExit.description: North of here you can see a ledge.

title: The Southeastern Corner Of The Ledge

westernExit.description: The ledge leads further west.

extras.description: There is a crack here that looks like it has been made recently.

description:
You stand in a completely dark cavern leading west.  The wall looks
weird here.
title: Under The Pit

description:
A ladder leads up from here to the Shaft.  A small opening leads west
from here.
title: Under The Shaft

upwardExit.description: It is too dark up there.

westernExit.description: You can see a narrow ledge going north and south.

description:
You are in a narrow part of the sewer.  Down the sewer continues and to
the north is the ledge.

downwardExit.description: You look deeper down into the drain.

northernExit.description: You can see the southern part of the ledge.

title: The Sewer Line

description:
You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of
CircleMUD.  The result of such a foolish act should be punished with
death, you know.  With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 meters
per second squared, you are now descending the Abyss.  What awaits you
at the bottom will continue to be a mystery.  Good-bye cruel world.
title: Mid-Air

extras.description: This is a heavy black stone door it looks very solid.
You read the number '666'.

description:
You are in a small but well equipped treasury.  You can see some writing
on the wall.  The ceiling has a funny glow, which enables you to see.  You
can get back into the inner lair through the stone door which is east.

easternExit.description: You look back through the opening into the inner lair.

title: The Treasury

description:
You are in a octagonal room with smooth purple stone walls.  The floor is
made from black stone.  In the western wall you see a large black stone door.

southernExit.description: You look back through the door into the lair.

title: The Inner Lair

westernExit.description: You see the treasury.

extras.description:
On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead.  All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You
also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.  To
the north is a wooden door.

easternExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

northernExit.description: You can see the inner lair.

southernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

title: The Lair

extras.description:
On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead.  All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You
also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

easternExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

northernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

southernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

title: The Lair

extras.description:
On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead.  All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You
also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

easternExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

northernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

southernExit.description: You see the lair entrance.

title: The Lair

extras.description:
On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead.  All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You
also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

southernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

title: The Lair

westernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

extras.description: All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You
also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

northernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

southernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

title: The Lair

westernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

extras.description:
On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead.  All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You
also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

northernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

title: The Lair

westernExit.description: You see another part of the lair.

extras.description: The slime is slimy and uninteresting.

description:
You are in a dry part of the sewer.  To the north is a wooden door,
you can see some slime at the lower part of the door.  You also see
some skulls and some broken bones.

easternExit.description: You see a crawlway.

northernExit.description: You can see the lair.

title: The Lair Entrance

description: You are in a narrow crawlway.  It is rather boring here.

easternExit.description: You see a four-way junction.

title: The Crawlway

westernExit.description: You see the entrance to a lair.

description:
You are in a sewer junction.  To the north is a small hole, to the west
is a narrow crawlway and to the east and south the sewer continues.

easternExit.description: You can see a sewer drain.

northernExit.description: You can see a small cave-like room.

southernExit.description: You can see a sewer drain.

title: The Four-Way Junction

westernExit.description: You can see a narrow crawlway.

description: You are in a collapsed sewer drain, which now is more like a small cave.

southernExit.description: You look back into the four-way junction.

title: The Small Cave

description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the north.

northernExit.description: You can see the drain continuing north.

title: The Sewer Drain

westernExit.description: You can see the four-way junction.

description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the east.

easternExit.description: You can see the drain continuing east.

southernExit.description: You can see the drain continuing south.

title: The Sewer Drain

description:
You are at the end of the drain around you the sewer has collapsed, the
only exit is west.
title: The End Of The Drain

westernExit.description: You see the sewer drain.

extras.description: The water is dirty but it looks like you would be able to swim in it.

description:
You are in a sewer drain where the floor is covered with water.  To
the north it looks more dry, south however the drain runs down into
some water.

northernExit.description: To the north lies a dry four-way junction.

southernExit.description: To the south you see a sewer drain filled with water.

title: The Half-Wet Drain

description:
You are swimming in some dirty water and are holding your breath.  You'd
better continue onwards before you drown.  It is a good thing that you can
hold your light above the water-level.

northernExit.description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs slightly upwards.

southernExit.description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs a little bit upwards.

title: Under Water In The Sewer

extras.description: The water is dirty but it looks like you would be able to swim in it.
Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.

description:
You are in a half-dry sewer drain.  To the north the drain runs a little
bit downwards into some water to the east you can see a small hole.  To the
west you see another drain.

easternExit.description: Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.

northernExit.description: You see the drain running down into some water.

title: The Half-Dry Drain

westernExit.description: You see a drain running to the west.

description: You are in a very small room, it is pretty uninteresting.
title: The Very Small Room

westernExit.description: Through the little hole you can see a half-dry drain.

description:
You are in a dry but dirty sewer drain.  The drain continues east and
south.

easternExit.description: You see a half-dry drain.

southernExit.description: You see another boring sewer drain.

title: A Dry Sewer Drain

description: You are in yet another sewer drain.

easternExit.description: You can see another drain to the east.

northernExit.description: You see a sewer drain continuing to the north.

title: A Boring Drain

description:
You are in a sewer drain, there is nothing special in here, except for a
loud echo.

easternExit.description: You can see another sewer drain.

title: The Sewer Drain

upwardExit.description: You can see a sewer line.

westernExit.description: You can make out a sewer drain to the west.

extras.description: The water floats to the east from here.

description: You are in a drain, with some slimy water on the floor.

easternExit.description: You see a sewer bend.

title: The Sewer Drain

westernExit.description: You see a sewer drain.

description:
You find yourself in an ordinary sewer bend, which bends from west to
north.

northernExit.description: You see a sewer drain.

title: The Sewer Bend

westernExit.description: You see a sewer drain.

description:
You stand in a junction of three sewer drains.  You see some odd
scratches on the pipe wall, as if from a gigantic rat.  North and
south the sewer continues as usual, but west it looks a little
strange.

northernExit.description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.

southernExit.description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.

title: The Sewer Junction

westernExit.description: You see a strange sewer pipe.

description:
You are in a sewer, where the slimy water runs down through a tiny hole.
You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.  There
is a sewer drain south.

southernExit.description: You see a sewer drain.

title: The Sewer

description:
You are in a very strange sewer indeed, there are some odd scratches on
the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.  And you can see a lot of organic
decay like bones from animals AND humans.  West the drain runs slightly
upwards.

easternExit.description: You see a sewer junction.

title: The Strange Sewer

westernExit.description: You see a slimy sewer drain.

description:
You are in a sewer drain with a funny damp substance on the floor, in the
substance you see a lot of decay.  You see some odd scratches on the wall,
as if from a gigantic rat.  Both to the east and west the pipe seems to run
down.

easternExit.description: You see a sewer.

title: The Damp Sewer

westernExit.description: You see a sewer.

extras.description: You see a lot of organic decay on the floor.

description:
You are in an ordinary sewer except for a lot of scratches on the sewer
wall, and a lot of debris on the floor.

easternExit.description: You see a sewer.

title: The Strange Sewer

westernExit.description: You see another sewer.

description:
You are in a sewer with more scratches on the walls.  And of course a whole
lot of decay.  The drain runs east and north.

easternExit.description: You see a sewer pipe.

northernExit.description: You see yet another sewer line.

title: The Sewer

description:
You stand in a sewer drain, you are able to see some kind of cave-like
room.  You see some odd scratches on the drain wall, as if from a gigantic
rat.  The sewer leads south.

easternExit.description: You see a cave-like room.

southernExit.description: You see a sewer.

title: The Sewer Drain

description:
You are in a little cave.  You are able to see quite a lot of debris on
the floor.  There is a sewer drain west of here.
title: The Rat's Lair

westernExit.description: You see the sewer system that way.

description:
You hang onto some steps leading down into utter darkness.  There is an
exit leading up as well, though you'll have to open the tiny rock again to
do so.
title: The Wall Of The Abyss

extras.description:
This altar is very special.  Faces appear to be smiling from it.  There
is a triangle engraved in the top of it.

The triangle is filled with small symbols.  They seem to be a language
you have never seen before.

description:
You are in a very dark room.  You notice that some faces are staring at
you from inside the walls.  In the middle of the room there is a small altar.
To the north there is a small round door.

northernExit.description: A beam of red light seeps through a hole in the door.

title: The Entrance

extras.description: The door is completely round without a keyhole.
The red light glows from the walls.
The walls look alive.

description:
The corridor is glowing oppressively in a red hue.  You can hear wailing
through an open black hole to the east.  To the south there is a round door.

easternExit.description:
The hole seems more black than the night.  It is appears to be "eating" the
red light around it.

title: The Corridor

extras.description: The shadow looks like a man in great pain.

description:
You are standing in nothing.  All around you there are stars.
Sometimes a shadow flies closely by you, wailing very loudly.  To
the north there is a small bright hole.  To the west there is a
small red hole.

northernExit.description: You look into a very bright hole.

title: The Realm Of Lost Souls

westernExit.description: You look into a red hole.

extras.description:
The writing says 'The one to the east, belongs to the beast.
To the west you will surely END your quest!'.

description:
You are in a small hallway.  There are doors to the east and to
the west.  To the south there are a black hole.  There is writing
in the wall.  Wails can be heard from the south.

easternExit.description: It is too dark to tell.

southernExit.description: A black hole in the wall.

title: The T-Crossing

westernExit.description:
You can see a big fire to the west.  It looks like a unhealthy
place to enter!

extras.description:
The skeletons looks like they had suffered the death of hunger.
One of them looks like he has written something at the wall.

The writing says 'A prayer to the GODS will not be heard, though
the only exit is death... Mother, I love you'.

description:
This room is very hot.  There are flames surrounding you.  You can
see no exits at all!  Skeletons are lying all over the floor.
title: The Firedeath

extras.description:
When you look at the skeletons, you can see that they once had been in great
pain.  They are hanging in their arms, and some of them were killed with a
sharp instrument.

The metal box is covered with dust.  You notice that it was once filled with
coal, as you see some small pieces of it.

description:
You are standing in a middle of a square room.  Along the walls skeletons
are hanging in rusty chains.  In the middle of the room there is a big metal
box, covered with dust.  To the south you can just make out a small exit.

southernExit.description: It is too dark to tell.

title: The Torture Room

description:
You are standing in a lot of mud.  A disgusting smell surrounds
the place, and makes you feel sick.  Small flames sometimes shoot
up from the hot mud.  To the west there is a small door.  To the
north you can see an iron door.

northernExit.description: It is too dark to tell.

title: The Hell Yard

westernExit.description: It is too dark to tell.

description:
You are clutching the steps on the wall so that you don't fall to the
ground down below.  You cannot see anymore handholds below you and thus
this stops your journey down, as the only exit is up.
title: On The Walls Of The Abyss

extras.description: The writing says 'BEWARE adventurer!'

description:
You are standing in the cave entrance.  It is very dark down here.  There
is writing on the wall.  There is an exit to the north.  A stairway leads up.

northernExit.description: To the north you can see a small tunnel.

title: Cave Entrance

upwardExit.description: You can see the stairs going up into darkness.

description:
You are walking in a tunnel.  It is very cold.  You can feel the presence
of a living thing... SOMEWHERE.

northernExit.description: To the north you can see the tunnel continuing.

southernExit.description: To the south tunnel continuing.

title: Cave Tunnel

description: You are standing in a room.  It is much cooler now.  The walls are glowing.

easternExit.description: To the east you see the tunnel going downwards.

southernExit.description: To the south you see a dark cave tunnel.

title: Cave Room

extras.description: When you examine the mud, you notice small worms crawling around.
The worms are purple.  They do not look edible.

description:
You are standing in a mudlike substance.  The smell here is awful, it is
rotten.  To the west you can see some light.

easternExit.description: To the east the tunnel still goes downwards.

title: The Cave T-Cross

westernExit.description: You can see some light to the west.

extras.description:
The stone looks very uninteresting.  BUT as you are about to turn away, you
see a strip of light coming through a small hole.  Conclusion: The stone is
moveable.

description:
The mud is getting deeper.  You are wondering, 'Would it be an idea to
leave, before I disappear?'.  To the south you notice a flat round stone
is blocking the way.  To the west you can see mud.

southernExit.description: You can see an opening behind the stone.

title: The Cave Turning-Point

extras.description: The socket looks like the work of a dwarf.  It is VERY beautiful.

The crystal globe is glowing with a pulsing light.  It looks like there is
smoke inside it.

description:
There is dust all over the place.  It looks like nobody has been here
for ages.  In the middle of the room you see a socket with a crystal globe.
The globe glows with a pulsing light.  To the north you see a stone door.
To the south you see a grey block.

northernExit.description: You see a round stone door.

southernExit.description: You see a grey block.

title: The Secret Room

description:
You are standing in a lot of mud.  The mud goes to your chest.  You feel
the presence of something IN the mud.  The only obvious exit is to the west.

northernExit.description: You can see nothing at all.

title: The Mudhole

description: The mud goes to your knees.  Otherwise the tunnel looks very normal.

easternExit.description: You can see a mudhole.

title: A Tunnel

description:
Here there is almost no mud, as you stand at the top of a small rock.  Just
beside you there are a sign which says 'WARNING!  The worms are dangerous!'

northernExit.description: You can see a lot of mud... Yuck!

southernExit.description: The tunnel goes a little downwards.

title: The Long Tunnel

description:
You are very surprised, as this room for a change are hot instead of
cold.  To the north it goes downwards into some mud.  There are also an
exit to the west.

northernExit.description: You see a lot of mud.

title: The Hot Room

westernExit.description: You see a entrance to a small room.

extras.description:
This is a statue of a imp, pointing to the west.  The imp looks like a man
with horns and a tail.

description:
As you look around you notice a small statue.  There are exits to the west
and to the east.

easternExit.description: It is pitch dark out there.

title: The Small Room

westernExit.description: You see a VERY long hallway.

extras.description: The stalagmites are very tall, and looks very beautiful.

description:
You are standing in a stalagmite cave.  Water is dripping from the walls.
It is very cold in here.

easternExit.description: You see a long hallway, and some mud.

title: The Stalagmite Cave

description:
You has entered a small tunnel.  Here it is quite dry.  Maybe it would be a
good idea to rest here.

northernExit.description: You can see a small cave to the north.

title: The Stalagmite Tunnel

description:
You definitely do NOT like this area.  It is very dank, and most of the
room is wet.
title: The Spongy Room

description:
You are standing in a cross.  To the north you can see some light.
Otherwise it is dark.

northernExit.description: You see some light ahead.

title: The Stalagmite T-Cross

extras.description:
You see some people dancing around a huge sun.  The sun is about 7 feet in
diameter, which shows the size of the picture.

description:
This room is obviously a blind end.  To the north you see a primitive
picture.

northernExit.description:
You see a primitive picture of some people dancing around a huge sun.  The
sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size of the picture.

title: The Blind End Room

description:
This room is richly ornamented.  The walls have been carved to show
people dancing around a moon which is drawn on the floor.  It looks very
old, and it is very dusty.  To the south you see the back side of a secret
door.

southernExit.description: You can see a picture with some peeple crawling around a huge moon.

title: The Treasure Room

extras.description: It looks like a adventurer who wasn't lucky.  You'd better watch out...

description:
You are standing in the south-east part of the lair.  You can see a skeleton
lying in the corner.

northernExit.description: Another part of the lair.

title: The Square Lair

westernExit.description: Another part of the lair.

extras.description:
The sign says 'Gods of War I call you, my sword is by my side,
I seek a light free from all false pride'
Reyemle Grug...

description:
You are standing in the north-east part of the lair.
You see a sign on the wall.

easternExit.description: You see a wooden door.

southernExit.description: Another part of the lair.

title: The Square Lair

westernExit.description: Another part of the lair.

extras.description:
The sign says 'I'm wandering around in a everlasting tale,
seeking the light to regain my pride
Corama...

description:
You are standing in the north-west part of the lair.  Here there is another
sign.  There is an exit from the lair to the north.

easternExit.description: Another part of the lair.

northernExit.description: You see a small tunnel leading north.

southernExit.description: Another part of the lair.

title: The Square Lair

extras.description:
On the table there is dust, in the center there is a small statue of a
Dragon sleeping.

They've obviously been killed somehow, but it doesn't look like it was by
sword or club.

It looks like a silver dragon.  It is nailed onto the table.  The dragon sits
on a red dragon that looks dead.  But the eyes of the red dragon are glowing,
pulsating red.  You feel drained.

description:
You can see a table in front of you.  It is very dusty.  Five skeletons are
sitting around the table.  Exits are north and east.

easternExit.description: The eastern part of the lair.

northernExit.description: The northern part of the lair.

title: The Lair End

description:
You are standing in dark tunnel, the exits are east and west.  To the west
you see a wooden door.

easternExit.description: You can see a muddy tunnel.

title: The East Tunnel

westernExit.description: You can see a wooden door.

description: You are standing in a dark tunnel, it leads upwards.

northernExit.description: The dark tunnel continues.

southernExit.description: You can see the lair.

title: The North Tunnel

westernExit.description: You can see a cave entrance.

description:
You are standing in deep darkness.  To the south there is a small exit.
To the east you can see a gaping hole.
title: The L-Shaped Room

extras.description:
When you study the faces of the heads you see that they are faces of dragons.
The face to the north is red, the face to the east is green, and the face to
the south is blue.
This looks like an evil dragon.
This looks like a neutral dragon.
This looks like a good dragon.

description:
You are standing in round hall.  To the north, east and south you can see
a stone head hanging on the walls.

easternExit.description: You see a green dragon's head hanging on the wall.

northernExit.description: You see a red dragon's head hanging on the wall.

southernExit.description: You see a blue dragon's head hanging on the wall.

title: The Circular Hall

westernExit.description: You see a room far away.

description:
You are standing in dust.  This place has not been touched for a long time.
Otherwise it is quite boring here, looks like a place to rest!  To the west
you see the outline of a door.  A tunnel leads to the east.

easternExit.description: You see a tunnel which leads downwards.  It is quite dark.

title: A Dusty Tunnel

westernExit.description: You can see the outline of a door.  Just like in the description!

extras.description: You have never seen this kind of footprint before!

description:
You are standing in a crossing of hallways.  You can leave this place
in every direction, except up and down.  In the dust you notice strange
footprints.
title: The Crossing

extras.description:
The sign says:

DANGER!!

description:
You are standing in a L-shaped room.  You can hear noises from the long
tunnel to the east.  You feel very afraid!
A sign is hanging on the wall.
title: The L-Shaped Room

description:
You can see burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red.  All kinds
of bones are scattered all over the floor.  On the walls you can see
some burned shapes.  You smell burnt flesh.  Two creatures are half
melted into the floor.

northernExit.description: You can see a long tunnel.

title: The Dragon's Lair

westernExit.description: You can see nothing but darkness.

extras.description:
The writing says:

DANGER

description:
You are in a room, which once has at one time been quite burnt.  There
is writing on the wall.

southernExit.description: You can see a red glow...

title: The Burnt Room

extras.description: The breeze comes from a hole above you.  NO way to get up there.

description: You are standing in a tunnel.  Above you, you can feel a breeze.

easternExit.description: It is too dark to tell.

title: The Windy Tunnel

extras.description: The glittering silver looks like it is INSIDE the walls.

description:
This room is very bright.  On the walls you can see some silver.  Exits
are west, east and south.
title: The Glittering Room

description: You have entered a tiny room.  There is only an exit to the west.
title: The Secret Passageway

westernExit.description: You can see a light to the west.

extras.description: The mass is nothing but a mass, but it is quite suspicious!

description:
You are at a end of a long tunnel.  Right in front of you, you can see a
grey mass.  To the east you can see a tremendously long tunnel, but you know
that, you were just there.

easternExit.description: A long tunnel.  JUST like in the description!

title: The End Of Long Tunnel

westernExit.description: A grey mass is blocking the way.

description:
You are standing in a small room.  Drawings of faces in pain are on the
walls.  You can feel that darkness is ruling the place.  There is one exit:
south.

southernExit.description: Nothing but darkness...

title: The Stair-Room

extras.description: It looks like bones of a human.

description:
You are standing in a dark tunnel.  It continues to the north and to the
south.  Bones are spread on the floor.
title: A Dark Tunnel

description:
The smell here is awful.  To the south you can see some smoke.  A tunnel
leads north and east.

easternExit.description: A small cave is to the east.

southernExit.description: The only thing you can see is smoke.

title: The Entrance To The Lair

description:
It is hard to see here because of the smoke.  To the north you can barely
see a small tunnel.  Other exits are to the south and to the west.
title: The North-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

extras.description: It seems to be a small hole, about one foot in diameter.

description:
There is a very small hole in wall from which the smoke is coming from.
Otherwise it is pitch black.  Exits are north and west.

northernExit.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

title: The South-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

westernExit.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

extras.description: The hay is very dirty.  The smell of it makes you feel sick.

description:
You can see some hay spread on the floor.  The smell is awful here, and it
makes you feel sick.  This place where the Basilisk sleeps.  Watch out...
maybe it is not far from here...
title: The North-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

description: You can see nothing but smoke.
title: The South-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

description:
You are standing in small cave.  You can see some light at the end.  Exits
are north and south.

northernExit.description: You can see only smoke.

southernExit.description: You can see a blue glow.  And you feel a fresh breeze... ahhhh...

title: The Small Cave

description:
You have wet feet, you are standing in water.  The water looks calm.  You
can see that it is a big lake.  Light seeps from the water.

easternExit.description: You can see more water.

northernExit.description: You can see a small cave.

southernExit.description: You can see water.

title: The Northern End Of The Pool

description:
You are swimming in water.  It is getting deep here.  It is also dark in
this end.

southernExit.description: You can see some bubbles in the water.

title: The Pool

westernExit.description: You see calm water.

description: You standing in water up to your neck!  You can only see water.

easternExit.description: To dark to tell, but you can feel something nearby.

northernExit.description: You can see calm water.

title: The South End Of The Pool

description: You are swimming in DARKNESS.  You feel something touching your right leg.

easternExit.description: You can feel a warm breeze.

northernExit.description: To dark to tell.

title: The Pool

description:
A huge cloud forms the plateau on which you are now standing.  The
wind here is absolutely quiet and the sun is shining warmly upon you.
From under the cloud you can hear the faint sounds of Midgaard.  Right
before you to the north lies the grand Mansion of Naris.

downwardExit.description: You see a Huge Chain that anchors the Mansion of Naris to the ground.

northernExit.description: You see an enormous arched gate leading into this magnificent building.

title: Outside Redferne's Residence

extras.description:
These runes are utterly strange to you, but you are in luck today:
Under the runes you can just make out a sentence in Common.  It
reads:

Stay out, if you treasure your life.  That is if you are mortal.

They read:

LIBRARY

description:
You are standing in a vast hall that is dimly lit, but wherever the
light comes from, is a mystery.  The walls seem to radiate warmth and
give the pleasent feeling of being welcome here.  A large portrait is
hanging on one of the walls.  A large wooden staircase leads up into
the tower.  To the east there is a high passage away from the hall.
This ends shortly after by a tall oak door.  The enormous hall extends
further north from here.  To the south you can see a huge, and VERY
heavy-looking iron-wrought door.  It looks like this is the only exit
from this magnificent old house.

easternExit.description:
You see a tall oak door there.  It looks quite tightly closed to you.
On it little runes are chiselled into the wood.

northernExit.description:
The hallway continues that way.  You can see more doorways under the
wooden staircase in that direction.

southernExit.description:
Here you see a REAL door.  It would be more proper to call this a
'GATE', rather than a 'door'.  It is really HUGE!  On it hangs a
large sign with very large letters spelling:

EMERGENCY EXIT

title: The Southern End Of The Hall

upwardExit.description:
You see the staircase extending upwards into the very high tower.
It ends in what seems like a large bedroom up there.

westernExit.description:
This looks like a 'door' in the meaning of the word.  The ashen wood
is painted in a peculiar yellow color.  Small letters are written
with black on it.

extras.description:
You see a large world map stretch out on the enormous globe.  It has towns
drawn in every spot available for such.  In the middle of the map you can
spot a large town with the name 'MIDGAARD' written over it.  The rest is
mountains, woods, plains and water.

You see a small speck with woods on the west from it, plains to the east
from it and mountains to the north from it.  To the east of it you can
see a thin trail lead to a large castle.  Finally you notice a rather
large river pour in from the east and go through Midgaard in the middle.

These two chairs are exactly alike one another.  They look incredibly
comfortable.  They are both made from old leather, and yet they seem
so worn that they can be nothing but a perfect place for a long needed
rest.

These windows are really BIG!  They reach from about 20 inches above the
floor to approximately 10 inches under the ceiling.  If you try and
'look out', you might see what might lie beyond these windows.

The clouds muster and form the ground on which this entire building is set.
Through the thinnest of the clouds you can just make out Midgaard with all
of its magnificent activity.

You see a large and winding river cut through the landscape, starting at an
enormous inland lake, it seeps through Midgaard and finally ends up in the
Grand Sea on the west coast of the land.

description:
This is truly a magnificent place!  Books and scrolls lie together
on every shelf.  A large globe, with the map of the world upon it,
stands in the dimly lit north-western corner of the room.  Two large
and comfortable looking leather armchairs adorn the center of the
library together with a huge oak desk.  Dim light radiates from an
enormous crystal chandelier hanging down from the ceiling approximately
10 feet off the floor.  To the east there is a great old ashen door.  A
large glass window is set in the west wall.

easternExit.description: You can see an old ashen door, painted in a peculiar yellow color.

title: Redferne's Library

description:
This is gloomy and dark room with only a faint light radiating from the
walls.  A bunch of funny-looking items fill the center of the room.  There
is no furniture here what-so-ever.  The only way out seems to be west,
through the low steel door.
title: The Artifact Room Of Naris

westernExit.description: You see only the back of a safe's steel door.

description:
You are standing in the northern end of the huge hall.  This part is
under the grand wooden staircase so the light seems to be a little less
bright here, but this doesn't affect your sight at all.  To the north
lies the kitchen.  To the south lies the southern end of the hall.  To
the east there is a huge metal door.  To the west there is a large
aspenwood door.

easternExit.description:
You see a huge metal door.  From it a foul stench emanates.  The smell is
the most awful experience in your entire life.  A thought seeps through this
terrible stench and into your mind: 'Monsters', you feel BAD about opening
that door.

southernExit.description: The rest of the hall lies in that direction, and so does the exit.

title: The Northern End Of The Hall

westernExit.description:
The door has 'SITTING ROOM' written on it.  It is made from Aspenwood and
is beautifully carved with small elves as main issue of sculpture.

extras.description: This is truly a wonderful relic of the past.  In it is a large cushion.

description:
You are standing in the middle of a really comfortable place.  The
walls are decorated with paintings of smiling Kings and Queens.  The
most attractive picture is one of a Prince in shining armour.  By one
of the walls there is an old armchair.  The only exit is through the
aspenwood door to the east.

easternExit.description:
The door seems to be a very HEAVY door, carved completely from the trunk of
an Aspen tree.

title: The Sitting Room Of Naris

description:
This must be the place of food and drink.  You can hear the faint noise
of rats feasting on meat and bread from somewhere undeterminable.  The sound
makes you feel the agony of HUNGER.  The only visible exit is south to the
Northern end of the hall.

easternExit.description: You can see the fridge from here.  There are drinks all over the place.

northernExit.description:
It is dark in there.  But the sounds from there are unmistakable.  The rats
are here for your information.

southernExit.description: You can see the northern end of the hall.

title: The Kitchen Of Naris

description:
You can see food all over.  Among the heaps of food you notice HUGE rats
scuttling around, nibbling pieces off the heaps here and there.
title: The Larder

description: This place is LOADED with drink, water and booze.
title: The Fridge

description:
You can see up and down the stairway.  It seems to take forever, either
going up OR down.  It is just a seemingly insurmountable climb, either way.
Up is the bedroom of Redferne, and down leads to the southern end of the
hall.
title: On The Stairs

description:
This place is gloomy.  A HUGE safe is cemented into the west wall.  The
only visible exit is west, through the oak door.
title: The Treasure Room

westernExit.description: You see a tall oak door.

description:
This is a snugly set bedroom with all the necessities for a romantic
evening.  A large fireplace adorns the east wall, and sizzling away is
the wood that is ablaze within.  The bed is enormous, covering at least
HALF of this great room.  The room stretches at least 140 feet, so can
you imagine the BED?  A large staircase leads down to the hall.  A couple
of doors open up to a broad balcony to the south.

southernExit.description: The sun seems to shine out there, warmly and comforting.

title: Redferne's Bedroom

description:
You see a splendid of the most of this world.  The valleys stretch as
far as the eye reaches to the south from here.  Down below you can see
the entrance of this magnificent building.  To the north are the doors
to Redferne's bedroom.

downwardExit.description:
You see the ground on which this castle is set.  Funnily it seems to you
that it is no more than clouds.

northernExit.description: You see the comfortable bedroom of Naris.

title: Redferne's Balcony

description:
This looks like the cage in which a large carnivore is being kept.
Judging by the state the walls are in, this could very well be a large
AGGRESSIVE animal.  This makes you pretty insecure, this stating your
feeling about the place quite mildly.
title: The Monster Pen

westernExit.description: This looks like the only exit from here.

description:
This place has quite a good view over Midgaard.  Your possibilities of
movement seem to extend only to the up and down directions.  Unless you
want to let go of the secure and seemingly unmovable chain, then those are
the directions you should take from here.

downwardExit.description:
Down below, you see the huge chain anchored to the ground at the Road
Crossing of southern Midgaard.

title: On The Huge Chain

upwardExit.description: Upwards, you see the chain disappearing into the clouds above.

description:
Hanging on to the chain you figure out that there is no way of leaving
down from here.  The wind pulls you from left to right and back.  This
seems like a totally impossible task.  The ascend is the only way ahead
for you.  Otherwise you would risk death by falling to the hard ground
below.  DO NOT DESCEND NOW OR YOU WILL SURELY DIE!!!!

downwardExit.description:
THAT WAY IS CERTAIN DEATH!!!!  You can see the wind tearing at the chain
down below you.  It swings like a furious serpent from side to side!  The
descent is ABSOLUTELY out of the QUESTION.

title: The Chain Where It Is Too Windy

upwardExit.description: That way seems to be the only way away from here.

description:
You are approximately on the middle of the treacherous Chain.  One false
step and death will come and collect you quickly.  The chain leads upwards
and down.  No way are you going to descend now... You've only just begun
your climb.  Besides it could cost you your life.  Look down and you'll
see why.

downwardExit.description:
The chain down there is swinging wildly back and forth.  Going down there
will be pretty risky!

title: On The Great Chain Of Naris

upwardExit.description: There seems to be only one way from here and that's up.

description:
As you descend, the chain seems to absorb all weather around it, making
it swing less and less in the very powerful wind tearing at it.  The Chain
seems to chuckle quietly, and as you descend further you hear a soft whisper
originating from within the Chain *ITSELF*.  It says 'Welcome back some
other time, stranger.  Your company is always... hmmm... interesting.  God
Speed.'  The chain extends further down through the now spreading clouds.

downwardExit.description: That way seems safe enough... now.

title: The Chain

upwardExit.description:
It seems to you that the Chain is dissolving again.  Maybe it is just an
illusion, but still...

description:
This place truly a splendid view of the WHOLE COUNTRY SIDE!  A magnificent
light shines upon you and the way up through the clouds is opened.  Up there
you can now see the Mansion of Naris, Residence of the Greater God Redferne.
The chain beneath you seems to evaporate in the mustering clouds that
surround you by now.

downwardExit.description:
You see nothing but the thick clouds.  They've closed completely around the
Chain.

title: The Mighty Chain Of Naris

upwardExit.description:
You see the sunny top of the clouds.  Beyond these, the Mansion towers before
your eyes.  Beautiful!!

description:
This is probably the third worst place to be in this entire MUD right
now.  You fall
.
.
.
and fall
.
.
.
and fall
.
.
.
and HIT THE GROUND WITH SUCH A *SPLUTCH* that you die horribly, but instantly.
Good-bye cruel world.
title: The Free Fall From The Chain

extras.description:
The cards all have been filled in with the judges evaluations of today's
combatants.  It seems that Sparticus is having a good day.

An ordinary #2 lead pencil.  Judging by the teeth marks on the shaft, the
user should see a dentist very soon!

description:
You stand in the midst of a small room with windows on the east and south
walls.  These windows provide a complete view of the competition fields.
There are several scorecards, pencils and other items that are used by the
judges sitting on a table.  The only exit is a trapdoor leading down.

downwardExit.description: There is a rickety ladder leading down.

title: The Judging Booth

description:
This is the best view in the house!  You can see gladiators fighting or
the chariot races with an unobstructed view.  The seats are upholstered in
red velvet and are in top-notch condition.  There is a rickety ladder leading
up and a marble staircase leading down.

downwardExit.description: There is a marble staircase leading down.

title: Caesar's Private Box

upwardExit.description: You see a rickety ladder with a trapdoor leading up.

extras.description:
The benches are made of rough cut lumber that has dried and split over time.
You would probably get splinters if sat on them.  The words 'BURT WAS HERE'
have been carved into one of the benches with exquisite care.

description:
This is the western side commoner's seating area.  There are row upon
row of rough wooden benches bolted to the floor.  There is stadium garbage
everywhere and the smell makes you want to puke.  Stairs lead up to Caesar's
private box, a small ramp leads down to the playing field and a hallway
leads south.

downwardExit.description: Watch your step!

southernExit.description: You see a small hallway that leads to a larger area.

title: The West Side Of The Commoner's Seating Area

upwardExit.description: Watch your step!

extras.description:
They look like they form the words "Onivel Cinemod Semaj"  But you could be
mistaken.

description:
This is the southeastern part of the common seating areas.  The benches
here are made of stone and are probably centuries old.  A few scratches on
one of the benches catch your eye.  An acrid smell is coming from the east
and a tunnel leads off to the north.

easternExit.description: There is an acrid smell coming from that direction.

northernExit.description: The tunnel looks like it leads to another seating area.

title: The Southern Commoner's Seats

extras.description:
The gate has been permanently rusted shut and is further secured by a large
chain and padlock.  Don't even bother THINKING about trying to open it.

description:
This used to be a gateway to and from western Rome.  There is an iron gate
blocking your way and judging by the amount of rust and foliage growing on the
bars, it hasn't been open for years.  Looking through the gate at the barren
landscape that lies beyond, you can see why.  A dirt road leads off to the
east, and a store is directly south.

easternExit.description: Through the clouds of dust, you can make out a passable road.

southernExit.description: You can barely make out a storefront through the foliage.

title: The Abandoned Gate

westernExit.description:
The gate has been permanently rusted shut and is further secured by a large
chain and padlock.  Don't even bother THINKING about trying to open it.

extras.description:
Titus has enough hardware in here to outfit a large army.  Maybe that's why
he has a lucrative contract to sell weapons to the Emperor's armies for
outrageous prices.

description:
Welcome to the weaponshop of Titus Andronicus!!  Rare halberds, whips,
swords and other instruments of death are proudly displayed on the walls
and in gleaming glass cases.  More common weapons are stacked like wood on
the floor.  To the north you can barely make out a gate.  There is a very
secure looking door to the south.

northernExit.description: You can see a city gate to the north.

southernExit.description: There is a very secure looking door blocking your progress.

title: Swords 'R  Us

extras.description: There are literally thousands of each.  Take your pick.

description:
If you thought that there were a lot of weapons in the front of the store,
you haven't seen anything yet!!  There is barely enough room to walk amongst
the crates of armor and swords.  No wonder Rome will stand for a thousand
years.  The only exit is through a door to the north.

northernExit.description:
Through the piles of weapons, you can see a door leading north to the rest of
the store.

title: The Back Room

extras.description:
You can see the entire city of Rome from here.  The buildings housing the
Roman government are to the east.  To the south east, off in the distance,
is the massive aqueduct and further in that direction lies the Mountain of
the Gods.

description:
You are now so high up that you begin to feel lightheaded and your nose
feels like it is going to start bleeding.  There aren't even benches to sit
on here; just bare dirty stone.  The view of the surrounding country is
spectacular.  Unfortunately you can barely see the playing field.  There is
a set of steps here, leading down.

downwardExit.description: Watch your step!

title: Peanut Heaven

extras.description:
He is a big muscular man with lots of armor.  He sizes you up and decides
that you aren't worth his time or trouble.
The driver is too busy changing a wheel on his chariot to notice you.

You see a two wheeled open cart which is obviously meant to be pulled by
horses.  The flaming paint-job and the large '01' stenciled on the side
identify the chariot as belonging to Drucilis 'Lightning-whip' Octavious,
a favorite driver of the masses.
The coach tell you "Stop bothering my athletes and get lost!"

description:
There are many gladiators, chariot drivers and their coaches here, warming
up in preparation for the games.  The dust rising from the parched earth makes
you want to sneeze.  A short tunnel leads east and the thunder of pounding
hooves and the clash of weapons can be heard coming from the south.

easternExit.description: There is a large oval dirt-track in that direction.

southernExit.description:
You can hear the clash of weapons and the thunder of hooves in that
direction.

title: The Practice And Warm-up Area

extras.description:
He is in the final stages of a charge against his opponent... THUD!  CLANG!
CRASH!!!!... judging from the blood and the amount of distance that now
separates the gladiators head from the rest of his body, you can safely
assume that this was the final combat of his life.

description:
This is a wide open grassy plane... LOOK OUT!!!!  You are almost
skewered by a gladiator's lance as he makes his charge.  A practicing
area is due north.

northernExit.description:
Through a small tunnel you can see athletes stretching and warming up for
the games.

title: The Jousting Arena

upwardExit.description: You see a set of steps leading up into the spectator stands.

extras.description:
DISGUSTING!  Each is about the size of matchbox and very slimy.  You are VERY
glad that you have access to a cleric!

description:
This is the place to come to if one is overcome by the heat and gore.
(Or if a lion gets loose)  You see a jar of live leeches and other barbaric
medical apparati lying about here.  From the west comes the roar of the
crowd, and a hall leads east.  The healer will be with you shortly.

easternExit.description: You see hundreds, perhaps thousands of people.

title: The First-Aid Station

westernExit.description: Rows of stone bleachers lie to the west.

description:
You are on a parched and dusty rural road which runs east and west.  There
is a structure lying to the south.

easternExit.description: Through the dust, you see a paved road.

southernExit.description: It is difficult to see through the haze and dust.

title: A Dirt Road

westernExit.description: It is difficult to see through the haze and dust.

extras.description:
The furniture that you see is very simple and plain.  It is made of rough hewn
wood and fastened together with nails.  It looks very uncomfortable.

description:
You are standing in the main living quarters of a common Roman citizen.
The furnishings are sparse and it is warm here.  A putrid odor is coming
from the east and passages lead north and south.

easternExit.description: What is that smell??!!!  It is enough to make a yak gag!!!

northernExit.description: A dusty road lies to the north.

southernExit.description: You hazard a guess that a bedroom lies in that direction.

title: The Commoner's House

extras.description: It smells of sweat and is covered with mud.

description:
This is the bedroom.  There is a hard and lumpy bed in the far corner.
It looks like the commoner's wife has been shirking her duties lately, as
there is a big pile of soiled laundry here.  The only way out is from where
you came.

northernExit.description: You see the living quarters to the north.

title: The Bedchamber

description:
These are the 'better' seats used primarily by the upper class of Rome.
There is a large seating area to the east and a staircase leading up here.
The view of the chariot track is pretty good.

easternExit.description: Rows upon rows of bleachers lie to the east.

title: The Noblemans' Box

upwardExit.description: The stairs look safe enough.

description:
This is a hard dirt track about a quarter of a mile long.  There are hoof
prints everywhere, and you see a large cloud of dust approaching.  You had
better move before you get run over.  A small tunnel leads west, you can see
the crowd to the east.  You can hear loud snarls and roars coming from below.

downwardExit.description: Do you like lots of live lions that haven't been fed for a few days?

title: The Race Track

westernExit.description: You see athletes warming up and stretching.

description:
As you land at the bottom of this dirt-walled pit, the realization that a
pit full of lions is NOT a good thing to be hanging around in.  Several of
the gladiators gather around the edge of the pit to watch your demise.  You
look around you, and all you see is tawny fur and gaping jaws... it is too
late to run, too late to hide.
Twelve lions rip you and your belongings into a gory mass of bloodied
leather, bronze, and bone.

What's that old saying?
Cats killed the curious?  Something like that, I'm sure...
title: The Lion Pit

extras.description:
A larger than life stone statue of Caligula, the Mad Emperor, looks at you.
It looks like it is holding a phallus.  He has got a grin on his face that
seems to say 'My horse would like you, I bet...'

description:
You are standing at the south entrance to the Coliseum.  There are
citizens of Rome everywhere, apparently in a mad rush to get in.  A
statue of Caligula the Mad Emperor overlooks the area.  There are long
lines standing to the east, and an acrid smell is coming from the west.
A busy road lies to the south.

easternExit.description: The lines are very long and people look impatient.

southernExit.description: A road lies in that direction.

title: The South Entrance To The Coliseum

westernExit.description: An acrid, almost medicinal smell is coming from that direction.

description:
This is a well built and heavily traveled road running from east to west
and there is a large structure built entirely of stone to the north.

easternExit.description: The highway continues to the east.

northernExit.description: You can hear the roar of a large crowd of people coming from that direction.

title: The Main Highway

westernExit.description: The highway continues to the west.

extras.description:
You walk over to the hole and see that there is a large turd floating in a
pool black water about 2 feet below the surface of the ground.  As you lean
closer to get a better look, your nose catches a concentrated dose of the
fragrant aroma wafting upwards.  Your stomach decides that it has had enough
of this shoddy treatment and you puke until it is empty.

Hey!!  This is first-class stuff!! - White Cloud brand with lotion.  The roll
is about half-used.

description:
PEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE-YEEEEEWWWWWWWW!!!!!  Boy does it stink in here!!!  You
taste bile in your mouth and your eyes begin to water.  As you wipe away your
tears, you see that this is a small room, in the far corner of which a hole
is dug.  The odor intensifies as you move closer and there is a roll of toilet
paper sitting on the ground.  The only exit is to the west and your nose and
stomach are strongly suggesting that you use it.
title: The Outhouse

westernExit.description:
The living quarters lie in that direction.  Why don't you stop pussyfooting
around and go that way??!!  Please?

description:
This is where the slaves sleep.  There are hard boards set out for use
as beds and not much else.  The only exit is to the east.

easternExit.description: To the east, a well manicured path winds through the nobleman's estate.

title: The Slave Quarters

description:
This is where many of the common Roman citizens are seated during the
games.  These are the cheapest seats in the house, as glare from the sun
is usually a problem during the afternoon.  Like the other common seating
areas, this place could stand extensive renovation and a thorough cleaning.
This area extends to the south and a much more elegant seating area can be
seen to the west.

southernExit.description: The common seating area continues.

title: The Common Seating

westernExit.description: The seating gets much fancier and elegant in that direction.

description:
This is where many of the common Roman citizens are seated during the
games.  Like the other commoners' areas in the coliseum, it could use
extensive renovation and cleaning.  This area extends to the north and
lots of noise can be heard coming from the south.

northernExit.description: The common seating area continues.

southernExit.description: You see hundreds, perhaps thousands of people.

title: The Common Seating

extras.description: The statue of Tiberius, made of iron, stands here.

description:
You are standing at the east entrance to the Coliseum.  There are people
everywhere, apparently in a mad rush to get in.  A statue of Tiberius, an
Emperor of a time long since passed, stands here looking out over the crowd.
There is a passage to the north, the ticket booth is to the south and a gate
opening to the city lies to the east.

easternExit.description: Nero Drive lies in that direction.

northernExit.description: You see rows upon rows of dilapidated wooden bleachers.

southernExit.description: There are VERY long lines standing outside the ticket booth.

title: The East Entrance To The Coliseum

extras.description:
It is a shame that the exchange rate for Roman money is so low.  What amounts
to a fortune in Rome isn't even worth one gold coin.  The contents of the box
add up to about... well forget it.  It isn't worth your time or trouble to
carry it around.

description:
Long lines are standing here, waiting to buy tickets.  There are three
vendors working furiously.  Ticket stubs litter the ground and you can see
that the people are getting very impatient.  There is a large, open cashbox
here.  Main entrances to the Coliseum are to the north and west.

northernExit.description: You see hundreds, if not thousands of people.

title: The Ticket Booth

westernExit.description: You see hundreds, if not thousands of people.

extras.description:
That would probably be the Coliseum.  There are a few good matches scheduled
for today.

description:
You are on a paved road that runs east to west.  You can see an elaborate
looking estate to the south and to the north-west, off in the distance, you
can see a very large stone structure.

easternExit.description: The road leads off to the east.

southernExit.description: It looks like a Nobleman's estate.  We are talking RICH nobleman's estate.

title: A Paved Road

westernExit.description: The road leads west towards the highway.

extras.description:
Venus, the Roman goddess of beauty and knowledge is displayed in a all of her
splendor.

A statue made of pure gold depicts Jupiter sitting on his throne.  The throne
looks like it is made of silver.

The statue of Neptune is made of pure jade and is holding a crystal trident.
It is sitting in the center of a small pond which has hundreds of beautiful
fish swimming in it.

All of the plants, trees and shrubs are perfectly trimmed, without so much
as a dead leaf anywhere to be seen.  You welcome the shade that they give
from the harsh sun above.

description:
